Then pierce the center of the abscess extended over the bandage and insert your finger into that area to feel for the bowel; and if you find it caught or held by the bandage, then carefully extract it and move the bowel away from inside the abdomen.
E si has atrobada la tela, lahoras pren aquel am unci; e inscideys las superfluitatz de lu.	And if you have found the cloth, now take one ounce of it; and incise the superfluities from it.
Mays si es contraria a tu arceria o vena, lahoras circunda aquel mot, e aprop retorna a la tua operacio; e pren dos agulhas e met en aquelas dos fiels fortz e entromet dos agulhas en le circuit le qual has feyt entorn le apostema en manieyra de crotz, las quals fassas penetrar; e aprop strenh le apostema en quatre partidas sobre las agulhas.	And if it is contrary to your art or vein, now surround that spot, and return to your operation; and take two needles and place in those two strong points and interpose two needles in the circuit which you have made around the abscess in a crisscross manner, which you should make penetrate; and then press the abscess into four parts over the needles.
E si tu vols, osta las agulhas e leyssa le loc entro que poyresca la carn extenduda e caia per si; o inscideys aquel quan es subtiliat e se poyreys, e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove dels enguentz entro que sia sanat.	And if you wish, remove the needles and leave the area so that the extended flesh can drain and fall off on its own; or incise it when it is softened and can be drained, and then treat it with whatever medicine is needed until it is healed.
E si la eminencia del ombilic es de carn nada en lu o per humiditat, lahoras cove que tu conquaves le apostema ayssi cum havem dit e estraguas le sanc o la humiditat, la qual atrobas en lu, e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove e que consolide le loc.	And if the eminence of the navel is of flesh or due to moisture, now it is necessary that you conquer the abscess as we have said and extract the blood or moisture which you find there, and then treat it with what is needed to heal and consolidate the area.
Capitol .liii.	Chapter LIII.
De curacio de cranc.	On the Treatment of Wounds.
Ja havem dit, en la divisio, de specia de cranc e en qual manieyra es via a la curacio de lu am medicinas, e que es squivador en lu la curacio am ferr per so que no sia ulcerat; e havem dit cranc engendrat en la mayra e cautela de la curacio de lu.	We have already discussed in the division, the types of wounds and how to treat them with medicines, and that it is important for the treatment to avoid infection so that the wound does not become ulcerated; and we have also explained the causes and precautions in the treatment of wounds.
E diyssero les antics que alcunas veguadas cranc es en loc on es possibla la eradicacio de lu, ayssi cum de cran le qual es en las mamillas o en la coyssa e a lor semblantz dels membres allocat a estrayre tot aquel, e majorment quan es comensant petit.	And the ancients said that in some cases wounds can be treated in places where it is possible to remove them completely, just as with wounds in the breasts or armpits and similar parts of the body assigned to extract everything, especially when they are starting small.
Mays quan es antiquat e es gra, no cove que te propries a lu, quar yeu non pogui sanar de aquel alcu ni no he vist autre, ni que sia pervengut ad aquo.	When you are old and gray, do not seek to undertake it, for I cannot heal from that illness nor have I seen another, nor has anyone else reached that.
E la operacio en lu es quan es allocat ayssi cum havem dit, es que tu precedescas e laysses le malaute e purgues de colera negra alcunas veguadas, e aprop sagna aquel, si es atrobada replecio manifesta.	And the operation is performed as we have said, when you proceed and leave the patient to purge from black bile several times, and then bleed him if retention is found to be evident.
E aprop prepara le malaute am preparacio en le qual sia locat am operacio, e aprop prohiceys en le trauc uncis les quals cove ad aquel; e aprop concava de tota part am la codena sego bona perexcrutacio entro que no romangua alcuna causa de las razitz de lu.	And then prepare the patient with the preparation in which the operation will take place, and then hold up hooks that are needed for it; and then wrap all around with a good cloth to prevent any cause of infection inside so that no reason for it remains.
E layssa correr le sanc, e no abscidas aquel leugierament, e exprem les locs, e abstergeys le sanc gros tot am la tua ma o am instrument am le qual es a tu possible dels instruments.	And let the blood flow freely, and do not cut it hastily, and press the areas, and wipe away the thick blood with your hand or with an instrument that is suitable among the available tools.
Mays si a tu fa contrarietat de sanc gros inscizio de vena o de arceria, lahoras cauterisa aquela entro que·l flux del sanc sia cessat, e aprop cura aquel am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	But if it is contrary for thick blood to coagulate in a vein or artery, then cauterize that area until the flow of blood stops, and afterward treat it with other remedies until it is healed.
Capitol .liv.	Chapter 46.
De curacio de ydropici.	On the treatment of hydrops (edema or dropsy).
Nos ja havem recomtat, en la divisio, de las specias de ydropici de l’aygua, e les senhals de quascuna especia, de la curacio de lu am medicinas.	We have already recommended, in the division, the types of hydrops related to water, and the signs of each type, as well as the treatment of it with medicines.
E aquela la qual es curada am ferr no es sino la specia de althitas sola, e no es aproximat am ferr a la specia de timpanistres ni a la especia de yposarcha, quar aquo es mortal.	And the one that is treated with iron is only the type of ascites alone, and it should not be approached with iron for the types of tympany or hydropsycha, for this is fatal.
E quan tu ja has medicat aquesta especia de ydropici timpanistre am medicinas e no comfereys la tua medicacio, lahoras considera, quar si al malaute ja es conseguida debelitat, o es am aquel autra malautia otra ydropici, ayssi cum si es en lu tos o cos de ventre e semblant ad aquels, lahoras guarda te que no le mediques am ferr, quar temor es sobre aquo.	And when you have already treated this kind of tympanitic hydrops with medicines and do not confine your treatment, now consider whether the patient has reached debility, or if it is another illness accompanied by hydrops, just as if it were in the chest or abdomen similar to those cases. Then guard yourself that you do not treat them with iron, for there is fear concerning this.
Mays si tu vezes le malaute de vertut exuberant, e am lu no es autra malautia sino ydropici tant solament, e no enfant ni vielh, lahoras la manieyra de la operacio de lu es que tu eleves le malaute entre las tuas mas, e le ministre aprop lu exprema le ventre de lu am la sua ma, enpellen la aygua a la partida dejos del pentenilh, e aprop pren spatum spinos segon aquesta forma:	If you see the patient with abundant vigor, and in them there is no other illness but hydrops alone, and they are neither a child nor elderly, then the method of the operation on them is that you lift the patient between your arms, and the assistant presses the abdomen of the patient with their hand, expelling the water from below the navel, and then take a spatum spinos (a sharp instrument) in this manner:
sia de dos partz agudas lonc, de aguda extremitat ayssi cum spatum; mays empero sia en lu alcuna brevitat petit a petit, per so que en la operacio am aquel no passes entro al budel, e que ledas aquel.	It should be of two sharp parts long, with a sharp tip like a spatum; however, it should have some slight tapering little by little, so that in the operation you do not pass into the bowel, and thus injure it.
E aprop considera si la generacio de ydropici es de part dels budels, quar lahoras cove que tu am la seccio te alonhes del ombelic per la quantitat de tres ditz a las partidas dejos, en le dreyt de lu sobre le pentenilh.	And then consider whether the origin of the hydrops is from the bowels, for then it is necessary that in your section you keep away from the navel by a distance of three fingers below, on the right side over the navel.
Mays si la generacio de hydropici es per malautia del fietge, lahoras la tua seccio sia sinistra del ombilic per tres ditz.	But if the origin of the hydrops is from disease of the kidney, then your section should be to the left of the navel by three fingers.
E si la generacio de lu es per la melsa, lahoras la tua seccio sia en le las dreyt.	And if the origin of it is from the spleen, then your section should be on the right side.
E no cove que la tua seccio sia sobre le costat sobre le qual vol jaser le malaute per que no corron las superfluitatz ad aquel loc freul.	And it is not necessary that your section be on the side on which the patient lies, so that the fluids do not rush to that place and cause harm.
E aprop perfora am le instrument tota la codena, e aprop entromet en aquela seccio, e eleva la tua ma am le spatum entre la codena e·l siphac, e tu excorja aquel; e si’ la quantitat de una ungla o enviro.	Here is the translation:
E aprop perforo le ciphac entro que pervengua le spatum al loc vuoyt, e es loc de l’aygua.	I then pierce the cyst so that it reaches the space where the fluid is.
E aprop extratz aquel e entromet un instrument del qual aquesta es la forma:	I then extract that and insert an instrument which has this form:
e es semblant a canula de argent subtil; es fayt de argent o de eram o de lato leon, al qual en la partida pus bassa de lu es un petit trauc, e en les costatz de lu so tres traucs: dos de una partida e un del autra partida; e fayta es la extremitat de lu insciza segon la manieyra de pluma, ayssi cum vezes:	and it is similar to a thin silver cannula; it is made of silver or ivory or lion's hide, at the lower part of which there is a small hole, and on its sides are three holes: two from one side and one from the other side; and the end of it is cut like the shape of a pen, as you can see.
E en la extramitat de lu pus sobirana es armilla, quar quan le instrument perve al aygua, lahoras aquela tantost deysen sobre le instrument, donc evacua de l’aygua en la ora miega quantitat, quar si tu evacuas de aquela mes que no cove en la hora, fort leu mor le malaute per resolucio del sieu spirit animal, o accideys a lu cincopi que es appropinquada la mort.	And at the upper end of it is a ring, because when the instrument reaches the fluid, then that fluid immediately descends upon the instrument, so that in each moment it evacuates a certain quantity of fluid; for if you evacuate more than what can be handled in an hour, quickly the patient may die from resolution of their vital spirit, or it could lead to suffocation which is close to death.
Mays evacua de aquela segon la quantitat de la vertut de lu e segon que significan a tu las disposicios del malaute de la vertut del pols de lu e de la bontat de lu.	But evacuate that fluid according to the strength of the patient and according to what is indicated to you by the condition of the patient, the strength of their pulse, and their overall well-being.
E aprop extrats le instrument, e rete l’aygua la qual causa es quar tantost es retenguda per la codena la qual rete le trauc que es sobre le ciphac del qual e recomtat a tu que perfores aquel segon aquela manieyra.	And then remove the instrument, and retain the fluid which is caused by the fact that it is immediately retained by the ligature that holds the hole on the cyst which you are advised to pierce in that manner.
E aprop itera le instrument al autra dia si vezes le malaute tollerant aquo, e extratz de la aygua petita quantitat, e fay aquo per alcus jorns sobre temor, e guarda te de error entro que no romangua de l’aygua sino pauc.	And then repeat the instrument on another day if the patient can tolerate it, and extract a small amount of fluid, and do this for several days with caution, and be careful not to leave too much fluid remaining.
Mays si tu temes sobre le malaute, e leyssas de l’aygua gran quantitat, lahoras cura aquel am sepultura en arena cauda, e mota suzor en banh, e al solelh espere per lonc temps; e cura aquel am medicinas dessicativas entro que sia sanat.	If you fear for the patient, and leave a large quantity of water, then bury him in fine sand, and sprinkle moisture on him in bath; and let him wait in the sun for a long time; and treat him with desiccative medicines until he is healed.
E cauteriza sobre le stomac, e la melsa e·l fitge aprop la extraccio de l’aygua, segon que yeu he recontat en aquo que es precedit.	And cauterize the stomach, and the intestines near the extraction of the water, as I have recounted in what has been mentioned before.
Capitol .lv.	Chapter .lv.
De la curacio dels enfants les quals so natz les locs de la urina no-perforatz.	On the treatment of children who are born with unopened passages for urine.
Alcunas veguadas alcun dels enfantz es eyssi del ventre de la sua mayre e·l cap de la sua mixtio no es perforat (o es trauc streyt o no es en son loc).	Sometimes some of the children are born from their mother's womb with the top of their urethra not perforated (or it is straitened or not in its proper place).
Donc cove coytar am perforacio de lu tantost que es nascut am spatum mot subtil segon aquesta forma:	Therefore, when there is no perforation upon its birth, treat it with a subtle cauterization according to this method:
E aprop pausa en le trauc un clavil subtil de plom e ligua aquel, e te per tres jorns o per .iiii.tre.	And place a fine lead needle in the straitened part and leave it there for three days or four.
E quant vol urinar sia remaugut e hurine; e aprop retorne aquel.	And when he needs to urinate, remove it and let him urinate; then return it afterward.
E si tu no pauses le plom, ja es possible que la urina la qual va sobre le loc, no leysa aquest claure.	And if you do not place the lead, it is possible that the urine which passes over the area will not wash away this closure.
Mays aquel del qual le trauc es streyt sia medicat am clavil de Plom, ayssi cum havem dit, per trops dias entro que sia amplificat.	But for the one whose passage is straitened, treat him with a lead needle as we have said, for several days until it becomes wider.
Mays aquels en les quals es le trauc no en son loc, so leditz, la qual causa es quar de aquels, aquel que es nat e·l trau es deves la fi del cap de la vergua per que no pot urinar a las partidas dedintz, entro que eleva la vergua am la sua ma a las partidas desus; e no es a lu generacio, per so quar le sperma no pot pervenir a la mayre segon rectitut, e es malautia mot laga.	But for those in whom the passage is not in its proper place, as mentioned, the cause is that which is born and the urethra is at the end of the penis, so it cannot urinate properly unless he lifts the penis to one side; and it is not suitable for generation, because the sperm cannot reach the mother correctly, and this is a minor illness.
E la manieyra de la operacio en lu es que·l malaute sia envessat sobre le sieu dos, e aprop exten le cap de la vergua de lu am la tua ma sinistra am vehement extraccio, e inscideys le cap del cap de la vergua del loc del perpucii am spatum agut, ayssi cum es inscizio de pluma, o que tu ne razas alcuna partida, per so que·l mieg de lu vengua semblant al cap de la vergua e que le trauc caia en le mieg loc segon que cove.	Here is the translation:
E guarda te que en la tua operacio de flux de sanc, quar motas vetz accideys aquo; e pausa te a lu am aquo que abscindeys le sanc, e cura la plagua entro que si’ sanada.	And guard yourself that in your operation for hemorrhoids, such things may happen to you; and pause there at the place where you stop the blood, and cure the wound within it so that it heals.
Capitol .lvi.	Chapter LVI.
De albater le qual accideys en le prepucii en le cap de la vergua e de corropcio e negror e adherencia del prepucii del cap de la vergua.	About balanitis, which occurs in the foreskin at the head of the penis, and about corruption, blackness, and adherence of the foreskin to the head of the penis.
Motas veguadas accideys aquest albater en la vergua e es eminencia de carn laga.	Often this balanitis occurs in the penis as a soft fleshly protrusion.
E de aquela una es maligna e autra es no-maligna.	And of those, one is malignant and the other is non-malignant.
No-maligna, cove que suspendas am unci subtil e abscindas aquela entro que aquela mondes tota; e aprop pausa sobre aquela coto submirgit en enguent egipciac; e aprop aquel, cura le am enguent diafinicon entro que sia sanat.	Non-malignant: suspend it with a thin thread and stop the bleeding until it dries up completely; then apply a poultice made of Egyptian onion; afterwards, treat the area with a cleansing ointment until it is healed.
E si albater es maligna, de lega color, lahoras cove que tu aministres cauteri aprop la inscizio de lu e la razio de lu.	And if the balanitis is malignant and has changed in color, then you should administer cauterization around the inflammation and its extent.
Mays si albater es en le prepuci del cap de la vergua no-circumcis, e la una partida de albater es dedintz le prepucii e l’autra partida es defora, lahoras cove que tu ostes albater le qual es dedintz al comensament entro que es consolidat; e lahora tu cura aquel deforo, quar quan tu curas aquel ensemps le prepuci, no es asegurat que no sia trinquat.	But if the balanitis occurs in the foreskin of an uncircumcised penis and one part of it is inside the foreskin while the other part is outside, then you should treat the part that is inside at the beginning until it is consolidated; and then you should treat the part that is outside, because when treating both together with the foreskin, it is not certain that it will not be injured.
E ja eysamen accideys en les genetius e en le prepuci negror e corruccio, adonc cove que tu conquavas tot aquo que ja es denigrat e que ja se vol corrompre o que ja es corrumput; e aprop lineys sobre aquel aprop aquo am mel, le qual es contusit am farina de scorsa de milgrana e de errs trissatz e crivellatz.	And if blackness and corruption occur in the genitals and in the foreskin, then you should excise everything that is already discolored, what is about to become corrupted, or what is already corrupt; and afterwards apply a dressing over it using honey, which has been crushed with ground fennel seeds and finely sieved.
E aprop cura aquel am l’autra curacio entro que sia sana.	And proceed with that treatment until she is well.
Mays si endeve flux de sanc, lahoras aministra cauteri lunar segon aquesta forma:	If blood flows excessively, apply cauterization as follows:
quar cauteri juvatiu es a dos disposicios ensemps, so es a flux de sanc e a la plagua quan es corrumpuda.	because cauterization is beneficial in two situations, namely when there is excessive bleeding and when the condition has become infected.
E si le cap de la vergua es corrodut e es destruit tot en la hora, lahoras cove que tu intrometas en lo meat del prepucii una canula de plom per so que le malaute urina per aquela.	And if the head of the urethra is corroded and completely destroyed, then you should insert a lead cannula into the prepuce so that the patient can urinate through it.
En la adherencia del prepucii am le cap de la vergua (et aquesta adherencia no accideys sino en aquel del qual le prepucii es sa, e sobre lu no es exhigida circumcizio; e quan accideys adherencia per plagua o per apostema) cove que excorjas am spatum obtus entro que sia dissolvut le liament e sia deliurat le cap de la vergua de tota partida.	In the adherence of the foreskin to the head of the penis (and this adherence does not occur except in one whose foreskin is intact, and circumcision is not required; and when it occurs due to an infection or abscess), you should use a blunt spatula to separate them until the bond dissolves and the head of the penis is completely freed.
E si es dificil desirnir aquelas exquisidament, lahoras cove que tu excorjes am spatum alcuna causa del cap de la vergua e del prepucii, e aysso es quar le prepucii, quan es subtil, fort leu es perforat per la sua subtilitat leugierament.	And if it is difficult to distinguish them carefully, then you should use a spatula gently on the head of the penis and the foreskin, because when the foreskin is thin, it can be easily pierced due to its delicacy.
E aprop separa entre·l prepucii e·l cap de la vergua am dra7 de li subtil, le qual ja es mulhat en l’aygua frega per que no adherescan autra veguada.	And proceed to separate the foreskin from the head of the penis using a fine thread, which has been moistened in water, so that they do not adhere again.
E aprop sia curat am vi stiptic entro que sia consolidat.	And then treat it with styptic herbs until it is healed and consolidated.
Capitol .lvii.	Chapter LVI.
De mundificacio dels enfants e de la curacio de aquo que accideys ad aquels de circumcisio.	On the cleansing of children and the treatment of what occurs during circumcision.
Circumcisio no es solucio de continuitat ayssi cum las autras plaguas: mays empero cum sia de la nostra operacio e de nostra voluntat, e lus de aquela sia propriament en les enfants, es necessari que asignem en aquela milhor operacio e via pus leugiera perdusent a salut.	Circumcision is not a solution for the continuity of other diseases; but since it is part of our procedure and our will, and since it properly affects children, it is necessary to determine the best method and the least painful way to achieve recovery.
Donc dic que les antics no diyssero circumcisio en alcu dels lors libres, quar no n’usan en las suas leys, e no es sino quar havem aquisit per speriment, la qual causa es que yeu he atrobat la major partida dels artifexs e dels barbies usar circumcisir e mundificacio am novacula e am torores; e usan de liament am fiel e de inscizio am la ungla.	Therefore, I say that the ancients did not mention circumcision in some of their books because they do not use it in their laws, and this is only because we have acquired it through experience. The reason I have observed is that most surgeons and midwives use a scalpel and scissors for circumcision and cleansing; and they use thread with glue and incision with the nail.
E yeu ja he prohadas totas aquestas manieras e no atrobegui milhor mondificacio am forfexs, am liament am fiel que en mondificacio cum la ungla, quar motas vetz efugeys la codena pus desus, quar la codena del prepucii a dos tunicas, e roman la tonica pus dejos, e fort leu es forsat ad autra inscizio e dolor sicura.	And I have already prohibited all these methods and found no better cleansing with scissors than with thread and glue in circumcision, because most times one avoids the foreskin being too tight above, as the foreskin of the penis has two layers, and remains a layer below, making further incision and certain pain unnecessary.
E am mundificacio le qual es fayta per alphecati, e es digital, del qual usan les sabatiers, no es segurada la inscizio de la extremitat del membre viril, quar fort leu intra en le trau de lu.	And in cleansing which is done by alphabeti, and is digital, used by barbers, the incision at the extremity of the male member is not guaranteed to be safe, as it easily leads to internal injury.
Mays en la operacio am ungla, fort leu obazeys ferr e corromp la tua operacio.	But in the operation using a nail, you easily err and corrupt your procedure.
E la codena del enfant es breu per natura, e motas veguadas nays en tal manieyra que no ha necessitat de mondificacio, e yeu he vist aquel.	And the foreskin of a child is short by nature, and many times it remains in such a way that there is no need for cleansing, and I have seen this.
Mays de la mondificacio que·s fa am forfexs e liamentz am fiel, la bontat, experiment descrobic a mi, quar las forfexs so de proporcional inscizio, per aquo quar la acuitat que es desus es ayssi cum la acuitat que es dejos; e donc cum tu premes la tua ma so proporcionadas dos acuitatz, e inscideysso segon una comperacio en un temps; e es fayta compressio del fiel am figura contenent la codena de la vergua de tota partida, am le qual no catz error de tot.	But with the cleansing that is done with scissors and thread with glue, the goodness and experience reveals itself to me, because the scissors are suitable for proportional incision, as the sharpness above is equal to the sharpness below; and so when you press your hand proportionally to both sharpnesses, and cut according to a measurement at once; it is made in such a way that the compression of the glue conforms to the shape containing the foreskin all around, with which you do not err completely.
E la manieyra de la operacio primeyra es que tu fassas estar le enfant majorment si es de aquels que entendo un petit, que no fassas sino que tu lies le fiel en la sua vergua tant solament, e que leysses aquel entro al autra dia.	And the method of the first operation is that you make the child lie down if it is one who can be somewhat understood, and that you tie the thread only on his penis, and leave that for another day.
E aprop fay aquel alegrar en tota aquela manieyra que es a tu possibla de aquo que recep la sua intelligencia.	And then make him happy in every way that is possible to him according to his understanding.
E aprop fa aquel estar entre las tuas mas estatuir preparadament, e no sia ges cezent; e occulta las forfexs en la tua ma o dejos le tieu pe, que l’enfant no veia aquelas ni degun autre dels instruments.	And then make him stand between you preparedly, and do not let him sit down; and hide the scissors in your hand or place them nearby, so that the child does not see them or any other of the instruments.
E aprop entremet la tua ma a la vergua de lu e suffla en la codena, e tira aquela entro que sia eyssit le cap de la vergua, e aprop mondifica aquel de aquo que es agregat en ela de sordicia.	And then insert your hand onto his penis and blow into the channel, and pull that inside until the head of the penis is exposed, and then clean what has accumulated there from dirt.
E aprop lia le loc signat am fiel dobla, e aprop ligua pus bas de aquel un petit le segon liament, e aprop te am le dit pous e endic tieu le loc del liament dejos am bona retencio, e inscideys entre dos liaments.	And then tie the marked place with a thread doubly, and then tie the second ligature a little lower than that one, and then hold your finger below the site of the ligature well to retain it, and incise between the two ligatures.
E aprop eleva la codena sus leugierament e estratz le cap de la vergua; e aprop leyssa le sanc corre petit e petit, quar es milhor ; e pausa polvera desus e sobre la polvera pausa drap en le qual es spandut mugol de huou coyt en ayguaros concosit am oli rozat recent bo; e layssa aquel sobre aquel entro al autra dia; e cura aquel am curacio entro que sia sanat.	And then raise the channel gently and extract the head of the penis; and then let the blood flow little by little, for it is better; and apply powder above and on top of the powder place a cloth soaked in the juice of hens' droppings mixed with recently squeezed rose oil; and leave that over it until another day; and treat it with treatment until it is healed.
La forma de las forfexs a mondificacio, aquesta es la forma:	The form of the scissors used for cleaning is as follows:
Sian las unas extramitatz no-talhantz e las autras sian talhant, que non sia yssit le ram del clau, e sia la longitut de las doas acuitatz ayssi cum la longitut de dos manubres engualment.	Let one set of the blades be blunt and the other sharp, so that the tip of the blade does not come out, and let the length of both edges be equal to the length of two middle fingers alike.
Mays la error en mundificacio es quar fort leu efugeys la codena intrinseca tota, o partida de lu deves la inscizio.	The mistake in cleansing is that you remove too much of the inner lining, either completely or partially where you make the incision.
Donc cove que tu extendas aquela de la tua hora am la tua ungla denant la apostemacio del loc e que inscidas aquela segon equalitat.	Therefore, you should apply the dressing for as long as your finger indicates before the abscess in that area bursts, and then incise it according to equality.
E si no la podes tenir am la tua ungla, lahoras extratz aquela am unci e inscideys aquela.	And if you cannot hold it for as long as your finger indicates, wait one inch before the abscess bursts and then incise it.
Mays si son passatz tres dias, e roman aquo que es imflat dejos la vergua apostemat, lahoras tu leyssa aquo entro que sia cedat le apostema caut, e excorja aquel am fecilitat, e inscidex aquel segon que a tu es preparat.	But if three days have passed and the swelling persists below the abscess, you should leave it until the pus is ready to come out, then gently squeeze it, and incise it when you are prepared.
E guarda te del cap de la vergua, quar no nosera a lu aquo.	And be careful of the head of the abscess, for that is where it should not be done.
E donc cura aquel am aquo que la plagua consolida de las polveras las quals havem recomtadas en le tractat de las polveras.	And therefore, treat it with the powder that the plague consolidates from the powders which we have recommended in the chapter on powders.
E si es inscidit de la codena sobre mesura, e obezeys a las partidas desus, aquo no notz a lu.	And if it is incised too much from the lining, and you follow the parts above, do not pay attention to that.
E mays cura aquel am aquo que havem dit entro que sia sanat.	And therefore, treat it as we have said until it is healed.
Capitol .lviii.	Chapter L VIII.
De curacio de urina retenguda en la vesiqua.	On the treatment of retained urine in the bladder.
Retencio de urina en la vesica es fayta per oppulacio fayta per peyra o per sanc congilat, o per poyre o per carnada, e semblantz ad aquels de aquo que havem dit de las manieyras de curacio en la divisio.	Retention of urine in the bladder is caused by obstruction due to a stone or clotted blood, or pus or flesh, and similar conditions as those we have mentioned regarding the methods of treatment in the division.
E si no es dissolvuda la urina, e veses retencio de lu esser per peyra le qual ja es en le col de la vesica, lahoras cove que le malaute sia encorbat sobre les sieus denolhs.	And if the urine is not dissolved and there is retention because of a stone which is in the neck of the bladder, then it is necessary that the patient be bent over his heels.
E aprop conponeys les pes de aquel sobre le sieu dos e extendas le sieu ventre de la partida pus desus del sieu dos, e le malaute estrengua le sieu ale tant quant es a lu possible.	And then place the patient's feet on his own back and extend his belly from the part above his back, and have the patient strain with his legs as much as is possible.
Donc lahoras le col de la vesica es costreyt ha espulsio de la peyra a las partidas detras, per que la urina es absolta.	Then the neck of the bladder is forced to expel the stone towards the rear parts, so that the urine can be released.
E si no es dissolvuda am aquo que havem dit he vehement es fayta la causa sobre le malaute, lahoras cove que aministres extraccio de lu am instrument le qual es apelat siringua, del qual aquesta es la forma: Sia de argent e sia subtil leon conquau, ayssi cum canula de pena de ausel am subtilitat de ray lonc en similitut d’un palm e mig, al qual sia cana subtil en le cap de lu.	And if the cause of what we have said is not dissolved with water and it strongly affects the patient, then it is necessary to administer extraction using an instrument called a siringua, which has this form: It should be made of silver and be thin like a quill tube, as fine as a sparrow's feather in subtlety and length about half a palm, to which a fine tube should be attached at the end.
E la manieyra del eyssiment de la urina per aquel es que prenguas le fiel doblat e lies en la extramitat de lu lana o coto per bona liadura; e entrometas las extramitatz del fiel en la partida dejos de la ciringua, e inscideys am las forfexs si superflueys alcuna causa de la lana, mays intromet la en la canula am vehemencia E aprop enongeys la ciringua am boder e am album de huou.	And the method of inserting the urine through this instrument is that you take a thread doubled and tie it to the end of the wool or cotton with good binding; and place the ends of the thread in the lower part of the siringua, and if there is any superfluous cause of the wool, cut it off with scissors and then insert the siringua gently and slowly.
E fay cezer le malaute sobre la selha, e embroca la vesiqua de lu e la vergua am olis umitz, e oli de oliva e ayguaros.	And have the patient lie on a chair, and raise his bladder with it, and lubricate the siringua with oil, olive oil, and rose water.
E aprop entromet la ciringua am facilitat entro que pervengua a la razit de la vergua; e aprop dobla la vergua desus a la partida del embelic; e aprop empelleys la ciringua dintz aquela; e aprop empelleys aquela entro que pervengua a la vesica, e aquela centa le malaute esser pervenguda a la causa vuoda, e no es fayt asso segon aquest orde, sino le meat en le qual va a tortuositat.	And then gently insert the siringua until it reaches the end of the tube; and then bend the tube above the part where it joins; and then push the siringua into that; and then push that until it reaches the bladder, and that causes the patient to reach the empty space. If this is not done in this order, but instead inserted into a winding passage, it will not be correct.
E aprop exten le fiel am la lana petit a petit, quar la urina siec la lana.	And gradually extract the poison with the wool little by little, for the urine dries out the wool.
Aprop extratz aquela e fay per curacio urina, e usa ciringua, no cesses fer aquo e usa ciringua entro que sia evacuada la vesica e le malaute atrobe alleviacio.	And extract that and use for treatment urine, and use a cup, do not stop doing this and use a cup until the bladder is evacuated and the pain is relieved.
Capitol .lix.	Chapter LIX.
De qualitat de clisterizacio de la vezica am clampcedra e am semblantz instrumentz les quals sian acordants ad aquo.	Regarding the quality of enema for the bladder with a syringe and similar instruments, which are suitable for this purpose.
Quan accideys en la vesica ulceracio o apostema, o sanc congilat en aquela, o es coartat poyredura, e vols en aquela destillar ayguas e medicinas, lahoras sia fayt am instrument le qual es apelat clampcedra, e aquesta es la forma de lu:	When there is ulceration or abscess in the bladder, or clotted blood in it, or constricted pus, and you want to instill water and medicines into it, then use an instrument called a clampcedra, and this is its form:
sino que en la extramitat de lu es sorda, so es clausa.	but at the end of it, it is blunt, that is closed.
Et en aquela so tres traucs: dos de la una partida , ayssi quo vezes.	And in that part there are three parts: two of one side, similarly on the other side.
En le comensament es loc concau, en le qual es aquo que es enpellit, e sia segon quantitat que oppile aquel, ses addicio, entro que quan alcuna causa es ab aquel tirada de las humiditatz, sia atirada, e quan es expellida, am aquo sia atirada, e quan es expellit lonc, segon que fa clampcedra am la qual es phicat naphta en las batalhas de mar.	At the beginning it is concave, in which what is to be introduced should fit, and it should be according to the quantity that fills it, without addition, so that when any cause draws out the moisture from it, it can be drawn out, and when it is expelled, with this it should be drawn out, and when it is expelled far, as a clampcedra has naphtha applied to it in naval battles.
Donc cum tu vols prohicir humiditatz en la vesica, entromet la extremitat de clapcedra en la humiditat, e atira am aquel aquo que es empellit a las partidas desus, quar la humiditat es atirada en la conquavitat de clapcedra.	Therefore, when you want to draw out moisture from the bladder, insert the end of the clampcedra into the moisture, and pull with it the water that is introduced into the sides above, for the moisture is drawn into the concavity of the clampcedra.
E aprop entromet la extramitat de clapcedra en la vergua segon que havem recomtat en la ciringua; e aprop empelleys la humiditat am aquo que empelleys, quar aquela humiditat perve a la vesica tantost, e le malaute cent aquela.	Then insert the extremity of the leather strip into the clamp as we have recommended in the circle; then apply the moisture with water that you use, for that moisture reaches the bladder soon, and the patient suffers from it.
Forma del cristeri subtil am le qual la vesica es cristerizada, e es aquela la forma:	The shape of the instrument with which the bladder is treated is as follows:
E sia fayta de argent o de lato, de la qual le cap pus aut sia semblant a petita pluma, e dejos lu cana dedintz liament.	And it should be made of silver or lead, the head of which should resemble a small feather, and below it a hollow tube.
E aprop pren vesica de moto, e pausa en aquela la humiditat que vols cristirizar en la vesica, e aprop lia aquela entre dos am fort liguatura am fiel doble, e escalfa aquela humiditat sobre le foc.	Then take a bladder of wool, and place the moisture you want to introduce into the bladder inside it, and then tie it securely between two with strong ligatures made of fine thread, and heat that moisture over the fire.
E aprop entromet la extremitat del cristeri en la vergua.	Then insert the extremity of the instrument into the clamp.
E aprop estrenh la tua ma sobre la vesica am la humiditat am strectura descent entro que·l malaute centa que aquela humiditat ja es pervenguda a la vesica.	Then apply your hand to the bladder with the moisture until it is structured properly, so that the patient feels that the moisture has reached the bladder.
Mays si a tu no es present vesica, lahoras tu pren una pessa de parguames e fay de aquel cercle; e perfora aquel de tota la sua retonditat; e aprop entromet fiel fort en aquels traucs, ayssi quo so revolgut; e aprop agregua le cercle ayssi quo es agreguat alsofatur, pus que tu pausas en aquel aquo que tu vols de las humiditatz, e olis e ayguas.	But if a bladder is not available, you take a piece of parchment and make that into a circle; then pierce it all around its circumference; then insert strong thread through those holes, both ways; then attach the circle as would be attached similarly, so that you place in it the moisture you want from humidities, oils, and waters.
E aprop tu lia aquel en le instrument e fay am aquel ayssi cum has fayt am la vesica, e exprescio am la tua ma entro que la humiditat pervengua a la vesica.	Then tie that to the instrument as you did with the bladder, and apply pressure with your hand until the moisture reaches the bladder.
Capitol .lx.	Chapter 60.
De extraccio de peyra.	Of stone extraction.
Nos ja havem dit en la divisio las specias de peyra e curacio de lu am medicinas, e la diferencia entre peyra engendrada en los ronhos e peyra engendrada en la vesica, e les senhals de aquela.	We have already mentioned in the division the kinds of stone and cure thereof by medicines, and the difference between a stone generated in the kidneys and a stone generated in the bladder, and the signs of each.
E havem dit la peyra en la qual catz operacio am ma, e seccio.	And we have said about the stone in which this operation is performed and its section.
E la peyra engendrada en la vesica propriament es aquela que es ficada en la vesica.	And the stone generated in the bladder properly is that which is lodged in the bladder.
E yeu so narrant aquel am exposicio manifesta e abreviacio.	And thus narrating it with that kind of exposition, clear and concise.
Donc dic que peyra engendrada en la vesica majorment ve als enfantz; e dels senhals de lu es que la urina que es eyssida de la vesica es semblant a aygua en la sua subtilitat, e apar en aquela arena; e le malaute fregua la sua vergua, e motas veguadas pen, e aprop es dressada; e am aquo yeys foro le cul en motz de aquels.	Therefore, I say that a stone generated in the bladder primarily affects children; and among its signs is that the urine excreted from the bladder resembles water in its subtlety but contains sand-like particles; and the patient scratches his genitals, experiences painful urination, and shortly thereafter feels relieved; and these are the main points about it.
E es laugiera la sanacio dels enfants de aquela entro que han conseguitz xiiii ans; e es dificil curacio en les viels.	And it is easier to treat children with that condition before they reach fourteen years of age; and the treatment is difficult for older individuals.
Mays en les joves es migiera per aquo quar es entre aquels.	But in young adults, it is moderately treatable compared to those cases.
E de aquel del qual la peyra es major e la curacio es pus leugiera; E si es pauca, es contraria ad aquela.	And for the one in whom the stone is larger and the treatment more difficult; And if it is small, the opposite is true.
Donc cum pervenem a la curacio de aquela, cove al comensament de aquela que mondifiquem le malaute am cristeri le qual extragua tota la fenda la qual es en les sieus budels; quar aquela fenda alcunas veguadas prohibeys la envencio de la peyra deves la inquisicio de lu.	Therefore, to reach the treatment of this condition, we begin by cleansing the patient with a diet that excludes all foods that might prevent the passage of the stone due to their inquiry.
E aprop sia pres le malaute am les sieus pes e sia contosit e maugut enjos per so que la peyra descenda al preon de la vesica, o que saute de loc aut alcunas veguadas.	Here is the English translation:
E aprop fay aquel cezer entre las tuas mas preparat, e las mas de lu sian dejos las coysas de lu, per so que la vesica tota sia fayta declinant a las partidas dejos.	Take that piece of skin which is most suitable for covering the wound, and let it be taken from an area where there are no important structures, so that the entire bladder-like structure will hang down towards the lower parts.
E aprop perquier aquela e tota aquela deforo.	And then examine it and everything around it.
Donc si sentes la peyra en l’espazi, lahoras tu te coyta tantost am seccio sobre lu.	If you feel the stone in the space, then you should immediately cut it open on that.
E si no catz de tot dejos le tieu tocament, lahoras cove que tu untes am oli le tieu dit indic de la ma sinistra, si malaute es enfant, o le dit miga si es jove complit, e entrometas aquel en le sieu cul.	And if you do not immediately find it with your touch, then you should anoint your left index finger with oil, if the patient is a woman, or the middle finger if the patient is a man, and insert it into their anus.
E perquier de la peyra entro que stia dejos le tieu dit.	And examine the stone to see where it is in relation to your finger.
E converteys aquela petit a petit entro al col de la vesica.	And gently move it little by little into the neck of the bladder.
E aprop prem sobre aquel am lo tieu dit, e expelleys aquel a las partidas defora ves le loc del qual vos la seccio.	And then press on it with your finger and expel it outward towards the place from which you made the incision.
E comanda al ministra que prema la vesica am la sua ma; e comanda a un autra ministra que am la sua ma dextra extenda les genetius a las partidas desus, e am la sua autra ma remaugua la codena la qual es dejos les genetius, en partida del loc en le qual se fa la seccio.	And instruct one assistant to press the bladder with their hand; and instruct another assistant to stretch the thighs outward with their right hand, and with their other hand to raise the fold of skin that is below the thighs, near the location of the incision.
E aprop entromet espatum be inscident del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And then insert a probe that has this shape:
e scindeys en lu aquo que es entre·l cul e·ls genetius, no en le mieg loc, abantz al latz de la coyssa sinistra; e sia la seccio sobre aquela peyra e·l tieu dit sia en le cul, e sia fayta seccio transversa, per que la seccio defora sia ampla e dedintz streyta segon la quantitat que egrecio de la peyra sia a lu possibla, e no major, quar fort leu comprem le tieu dit le qual es en le cul la peyra deves la seccio, e es foro-getada ses defacultat.	and cut in the area between the anus and the thighs, not in the middle but towards the left side; make the incision over the stone with your finger in the anus, and ensure that the incision is transverse, so that the external part of the incision is wide while the internal part is narrow according to how much you need to remove the stone, as much as possible without making it larger, because your finger will easily compress the stone behind the incision, and it will come out without difficulty.
E sapias que de la peyra es alcuna a la qual so angle e margers, per que le eyssiment de lu es fayt deficil per aquo.	And know that there is some stone which has angles and edges, because of which it is difficult to polish it smoothly.
E de aquela aquo es leon semblant a glan, e es redonda, e es fayt de lu leugier eyssiment.	And there is one that resembles a lion's paw in shape, it is round, and it is easily polished smooth.
Donc si es aquela al qual so angles e marger, ajusta en la fissura.	Therefore, for the one that has angles and edges, adjust it into the fissure.
E si no es ayssi foro-getada, lahoras cove que tu engenes sobre aquel, o que strenguas sobre aquel am gesti decentment, la extremitat del qual sia ayssi cum lima am le qual strenguas sobre la peyra, e no evasesca de lu; o que entrometas dejos lu instrument subtil de curvada extremitat.	And if it is not drilled accordingly, now cover over that part, or apply force to it gently with a suitable gesture, the end of which should be like a file with which you smooth the stone without slipping; or insert an intricate curved instrument between them.
Mays si tu no podes sobre aquel, lahoras tu amplifica le trauc un petit, e si tu veus flux de sanc, abscindeys en strenh aquel am vitriol trissat.	But if you cannot do that, now expand the wound a little, and if you see blood flowing, staunch it by pressing with vinegar of tartar.
Mays si la peyra es mays de una, lahoras al comensament tu impelleys la ma a la boca de la vesica, e aprop inscideys sobre lu; e aprop impelleys un petit aprop aquo; e semblantment fay si son motas mays de doas.	But if there is more than one stone, at the beginning you press your hand to the mouth of the bladder, and then incise it slightly; and then gently push a little further from that point; and similarly proceed if they are in greater numbers.
E si es peyra mot gran, lahoras ignorancia es que tu inscidas aquel am gran seccio, quar accideys al malaute una de doas causas: o que mora o que endevengua a lu destillacio de urina continuabla, per aquo quar le loc no es de tot consolidat.	And if the stone is very large, it is ignorance to incise it with a large section, because this causes the patient one of two evils: either death or that they suffer from continuous urine distillation, because the area does not heal completely.
Mays aministra expulcio de lu entro que sia fora-getada, o engenia en la fractura de lu am las forfexs entro que extragua aquela en pessas.	But administer an expulsion to remove it entirely, or devise a fracture of it with forceps so that you extract it in pieces.
Donc cum tu auras cumplit la tua opperacio, lahoras omple la plagua de enses de aloe e de sanc de drago, e strenh aquel.	Therefore, when you have completed your operation, now fill the wound with pulp of aloes and dragon's blood, and press it firmly.
E pausa sobre aquel drap enfus en oli e vi, o en oli rozat e aygua frega, per so que apostema caut sia cedat.	And place on it a cloth soaked in oil and wine, or in rose oil and water mixed, so that the abscess may yield.
E aprop resupina le malaute sobre le sieu col, e no deslias le liament entro al tertz dia.	And apply the poultice to the affected area on the first day, and do not loosen the bandage until the third day.
E cum aquel auras desliat, embroca le loc am aygua e mot oli, e aprop cura aquel am enguent diafinicon e am enguent diabazilicon entro que sia sanat.	And when that bandage is removed, wash the area with water and a little oil, then apply a healing ointment made from chamomile and one made from balsam until it is healed.
Mays si en la plagua accideys apostema caut, adhust e corrosiu, e de aquel semblantz ayssi cum si le sanc es en la vesica congelat, e per lu es la hurina prohibida (e aquo es conogut per la egressio del sanc am urina), a donc entromet lo tieu dit en la plagua e extratz aquel sanc, quar si roman provoca la vesica a corropcio de la vesica e de lu putrefaccio.	But if an abscess occurs in the wound, which is adhesed and corroded, and it appears as if the blood is frozen in a bladder (and because of this, urination is prohibited), then insert your finger into the wound and extract that blood, for if you leave it, it will cause corruption of the bladder and putrefaction.
E aprop lava la plagua am vi agre, aygua e sal, e am opposicio a tota specia, am aquo que conveneys a lu de la curacio entro que sia sanat.	And then wash the wound with sour wine, water and salt, and apply whatever is appropriate to its condition for healing until it is healed.
E cove en las horas de tota la curacio que tu lies amdos las coyssas e ajustes las medicinas las quals so pausadas sobre le loc.	And throughout the entire healing process, you should examine both the wounds and adjust the medicines that are applied to the area.
E si la peyra es petita e es en le meat de la vergua, e es ficat en lu, e eyssement de urina es prohibit, lahoras cura aquel am aquo que yeu recomti denant que pervenguas a seccio, quar tropas veguadas per aquesta curacio yest acusat de seccio; e ja yeu e esproat aquo, e es que tu prenguas un perforador de ferr alfelut, del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if the stone is small and in the urethra, and is stuck there, and urination is prohibited, then treat it with what I recommend before resorting to surgery, as those treated by this method are less likely to require surgery; and I have seen this, and that you should take a fine iron probe, which has the shape of:
de triangulada extramitat, agut, ficat en fust.	with a triangular tip, sharp, fitted to a handle.
E aprop pren fiel, e lia am aquel la vergua dejos la peyra per so que no retorne a la vesica.	Take some wax, and tie it to the thread below the stone so that it does not return to the bladder.
E aprop entromet le ferr en la vergua, perforant am fecilitat entro que·l perforador vengua ad aquela peyra.	Approach the iron to the thread, piercing with ease until the piercer reaches that stone.
E revolveys le perforador am la tua ma en aquela peyra petit a petit, e tu perforsa la perforacio de lu entro que fassas aquel del autra part penetrar; quar la urina tantost es absolta.	And rotate the piercer with your hand on that stone little by little, and you will make the penetration so that it allows the other side to enter; for the urine is immediately relieved.
E aprop prem la tua ma sobre aquo que es romas de la peyra de la partida deforo de la vergua, quar aquela es trinquada, e es foro-getada am la urina, e le malaute es sanat.	And then press your hand on what is broken of the stone that is left above the thread, for that part is shattered, and it is discharged with the urine, and the illness is cured.
Mays si aquesta curacio no es a tu aparelhada per alcuna causa la qual prohibeys de aquela, lahoras lia un fiel dejos la peyra, e autra fiel desus la peyra.	But if this treatment is not suitable for you due to some cause that prohibits it, then tie a piece of wax below the stone and another piece above the stone.
E aprop encideys sobre la peyra en aquela vergua entre doas liaduras.	And then cut into the stone on that thread between the two ties.
E aprop extratz aquela.	And then extract it.
E aprop deslia le liament e mondifica le sanc congilat, le qual es fayt en la plagua.	And then untie the ligature and clean the congested blood, which is caused by the condition.
E no es necessari liament de fiel dejos la peyra, sino per que no retorne a la vesica, e l’autre liament desus sino, quar quan es desliat le fiel aprop la egrecio de la peyra, la codena retorna a son loc e cobra la plagua.	And it is not necessary to tie wax below the stone except to prevent it from returning to the bladder, and the other tie above it, because when the wax near the edge of the stone is untied, the wound will return to its place and the illness will recur.
E per aquo es a tu necessari quan lias le fiel desus, que tu eleves la codena a las partidas desus, o que retorne deves le tieu compliment, e cobra la plagua ayssi co havem dit.	And for this reason, it is necessary for you to tie the wax above so that you lift the wound to the upper parts or return it carefully, and the illness will recur as we have said.
Capitol .lxi.	Chapter LXI.
De extraccio de peyra de las femnas.	On the Removal of Stones from Women.
Peyra en las femnas pauc es engendrada.	Stones in women are rarely formed.
Mays si ve peyra ad alcuna de aquelas, lahoras dificil es la curacio de lu, e es prohibida per tropas manieyras.	If a stone is found in any of them, the treatment is difficult at that time, and it is prohibited by many methods.
La una de lor es quar la femna fort leu es verges.	One of them is that the woman is very light or weak.
E la segonda es quar tu no trobas femna be scient que descroba si meteyssa al metge quan es casta, o es de las femnas haventz maritz.	The second is that you do not find a woman who is honest enough to disclose whether she has visited the doctor when she is chaste, or if she is among women who have husbands.
La tersa es quar tu no hatrobas femna be sabent aquesta art, majorment la operacio am ma.	The third is that you do not find a woman who knows this art, especially the operation itself.
E la quarta es que·l loc de la seccio sobre peyra en las femnas es longinc del loc de la peyra, per que indigeys de seccio preonda, e en aquela es temor.	The fourth is that the location for the incision to remove a stone in women is far from the location of the stone, so a distant incision is needed, and this is dangerous.
Mays si necessitat provoca a tu ad aquo, lahoras cove que tu prenguas una femna metga be scient, e pauc es atrobada.	But if necessity compels you to do this, then it is necessary for you to seek an honest and knowledgeable female assistant, and such women are rarely found.
Mays si tu es privat de aquela, lahoras cerca metga quast e subtil, o presenta una femna matrona be esenhada en le feyt de las femnas, o femna que en aquesta art ennueys partida del art.	But if you lack such an assistant, then seek a discreet and careful woman, or present a respected midwife who is honest about women's matters, or a woman who has some knowledge of this art.
Donc fay aquela present, e comanda a lu que fassa tot aquo que tu li mandaras, de la enquisicio sobre la peyra al comensament; la qual causa es que reguarde si la femna es verges, lahoras cove que meta lo sieu dit en le cul de lu e quiera la peyra.	Therefore, present her and command her to do everything you instruct her from the examination of the stone at the beginning; the reason for this is to ensure that the woman is honest, so she should insert her finger into the woman's body to locate the stone.
Donc si atroba aquela, coarte aquela dejos le sieu dit, e lahoras comanda a lu que inscida sobre aquela.	Then if you find that one, cut it below the joint, and now order them to incise on that one.
Mays si no es verge, lahoras comanda a la matrona que entrometa lo sieu dit en le conh de la malauta e enquiera sobre la peyra, pus que pausa la sua ma sinistra sobre la vesica, e comprem aquela am bona comprecio.	But if it is not a virgin, now order the midwife to insert her finger into the patient's vagina and feel for the stone, as she places her left hand on the bladder, and compress that one well.
Donc si atroba aquela, lahoras cove que gradantment maugua aquela de l’orrifici de la vesica a las partidas dejos am somman de la sua vertut entro que pervengua am aquel a la razit de la coyssa.	Then if you find that one, now proceed to gradually remove it from the bladder's opening towards the posterior at the height of its strength until it reaches the end of the issue.
E aprop inscida sobre aquela apposicio de la maytat del conh deves la razit de la coyssa de qualque part sia a lu parada e cent la peyra en aquela partida, e·l dit de lu no sia remaugut de la peyra coartan dejos lu.	And then incise on that position in the middle of the vagina at the end of the issue from whichever part is convenient for you and push the stone into that place, and make sure the finger does not slip off the stone when cutting below it.
E la seccio sia pauca al comensament; e aprop entrometa lo ray sobre aquela seccio, e si sent la peyra, lahoras ajuste en seccio segon la quantitat la qual sap que la peyra sira getada de aquela.	And the incision should be small at the beginning; then insert the probe into that section, and if you feel the stone, now adjust the incision according to the amount you know will allow the stone to be expelled from there.
E sapias que las specias de peyra son motas: quar de aquelas es pauca e gran, e leon e aspra, e longua e redonda, e havent ramps.	And know that the types of stones are various: some are small and hard, others are sharp and rough, long and round, and having edges.
Donc tu sapias quantas specias so de lu per aquo que tu signifiques sobre aquo que vols.	Then you should know the types of stones based on what you understand and wish to convey.
E si tu veus flux de sanc, ajusta en le loc vetriol trissat e te aquela per una hora entro que sia abscindit le sanc, e aprop retorna a la tua operacio entro que la peyra sia fora-getada.	And if you see blood flowing, apply crushed vitriol to that area for one hour until the bleeding stops, and then return to your operation until the stone is expelled.
E fay que prepares am tu dels instrumentz les quals e ditz en la extraccio de peyra en les homes, per so que sias ajudat per aquels en la tua operacio.	And make sure you prepare the instruments that are mentioned in the extraction of stones in men, so that they can assist you in your operation.
E si tu veus flux de sanc, e sabes que la expulcio del sanc es de la arceria que es insciza, lahoras tu pausa polvera sobre le loc e estrenh aquel am pulvils e strictura descent, e no iteras aquo; e layssa la peyra e no extraguas aquela, quar fort leu morira la malauta.	And if you see bleeding, and know that the expulsion of blood is from the artery that was cut, then sprinkle powder on the wound and bind it tightly with bandages and compression, and do not repeat this; and leave the stone [or clot] and do not remove it, for the patient may die quickly otherwise.
E aprop cura la plagua.	And then treat the wound.
Donc cum es cedada la acuitat del sanc aprop alcus jorns, e·l loc se poyreys, lahoras tu retorna a la tua operacio entro que la peyra sia fora-getada.	When the intensity of the bleeding has diminished after some days and the wound is healing, then you may return to your operation once the clot has been expelled.
Capitol lxii.	Chapter LXII.
De seccio sobre ernia acoza.	About the treatment of hernias.
Hernia ayguoza no es sino agregacio de humiditat en le ciphac blanc lo qual es dejos la codena dels genetius contenent le huou, e es nompnat ciphac.	A hernia is nothing but an aggregation of moisture in the white membrane below the arch of the inguinal canal, which contains the spermatic cord, and this is called a pouch.
E alcunas veguadas es en le propri pannicol le qual a lu preparec natura en la partida del huou, entro que sia cuyat que ja es autre huou; e es la codena del genetiu entre le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, e no es aquo sino tart.	And in some cases, it is in the proper fatty tissue that nature has prepared for the passage of the spermatic cord, such that it appears to be another cord; and this is the inguinal canal between the white membrane which we have mentioned, and it is not like that immediately.
E la generacio de aquest hernia es per debelitat la qual accideys als genetius, per que ad aquels es efundunda aquesta materia, e alcunas vetz accideys per percuscio fayta sobre les genetius.	And the generation of this hernia is due to weakness that occurs in the inguinal region, through which this matter protrudes, and sometimes it happens due to impact on the inguinal area.
E aquesta humiditat es havent motas colors, quar la color de lu o es declinant a citrina o a sanguinent, o rog, o es negra feculenta, o es ayguosa blanqua, e es aquo que es mays.	And this moisture can have various colors; the color of it may incline to yellowish or reddish, or brown, or be black and thick, or be watery and white, and these are the most common types.
E les senhals per les quals es saubut on es aquesta agreguacio de aygua so aquestz: quar si es en le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, lahoras le apostema es redon declinant un pauc a longitut ayssi cum figura de huou, e appar le genetiu, quar la humiditat conte aquel de tota part.	And the signs by which it is known where this collection of water lies are as follows: for if it is in the white skin that we have mentioned, then at that moment the abscess is round, sloping slightly in length like a hen's egg, and the heat appears, because the moisture contained there spreads on all sides.
E si la humiditat es en le propri pannicol, lahoras le apostema es redon am partida del huou e per aysso hom estima que es autre huou.	And if the moisture is in the proper fatty tissue, then the abscess is round but divided like two eggs side by side, and for this reason one estimates it to be another kind of egg.
E si la humiditat es entre la codena dels genetius e·l ciphac blanc, lahoras catz dejos le centiment.	And if the moisture is between the redness of the heat and the white skin, then at that moment it is below the center.
E cum tu vols la cognicio de la color de la humiditat, lahoras tu esproa la color de la humiditat en le apostema am entromes cayrat del qual la forma es precedida; e segon aquo que es eyssit en le vestigi del entromes, jutga de aquo que es dedintz lu.	And when you want to know the color of the moisture, then you should examine the color of the moisture in the abscess through a puncture where its form is preceded; and according to what is seen in the marks of the puncture, judge about what is inside it.
Donc quan nos vinem a la curacio de lu am ferr, lahoras cove que comandem al malaute que sia fleubotomat si aquo es a tu possibla, e vezes le cos de lu ple.	Therefore, when we come to the treatment of it with iron, then it is necessary to command the patient to be bled if that is possible for you, and to apply the body of the abscess to the vapor.
E aprop sia resupinat sobre le sieu dos sobre alcuna causa un pauc auta, e pausa dejos lu motz draps.	And let him lie supine on his bed raised somewhat high for some reason, and place under the abscess warm cloths.
E aprop setz tu sobre la part sinistra de lu, e comanda al ministra que segua a la dextra de lu, le qual extenda la sua vergua a hun de dos latz a la codena dels genetius e a la partida del mirac del ventre.	And you should stand on the left side of him, and command the assistant to stand on his right side, who should extend his hand from one of the two sides to the redness of the heat and to the part near the navel.
E aprop pren spatum lat e scindeys la codena dels genetius del mieg loc per la longitut entro prop le pentenilh.	And then take a broad spatula and cut the redness of the heat from the middle location along its length near the navel.
E sia fayta la seccio segon rectetut engualment distant de la linha que deveseys la pel dels genetius, entro que pervengua al ciphac blanc comprehendent.	And let the incision be made according to the rule equally distant from the line that should follow the hair of the pubis, until it reaches the white line encompassing.
E excorja aquel, e observa, e guarda te per aysso que tu no inscidas aquel; e la tua excoriacio am la qual aquel excorjas per partida jassia que sia suspenduda am le huou mays e subtilment escruta am la excoriacio segon la quantitat a tu possibla.	And scrape that area, and observe, and be careful so that you do not incise it; and your scraping of the place where you are scraping should be suspended more and examined on the scraping according to the quantity as much as possible.
E aprop perfora le ciphac ple de aygua am perforacio ampla, e extratz tota l’aygua.	And then pierce the white line full of water at a wide perforation, and extract all the water.
E aprop separa entre doas labias de la seccio am uncis, e exten le ciphac a las partidas desus; e no toques la codena les genetius comprehendent, e inscideys le ciphac en aquela manieyra que es a tu possible.	And then separate between the two lips of the incision with forceps, and extend the white line in the parts above; and do not touch the membrane surrounding the pubis, and incise the white line in that manner as much as possible.
E inscideys aquel am la sua totalitat o en pessas, e majorment le sieu latz subtil, quar si tu no perscrutas exquisidament la inscizio de lu, no es fayta segurtat que la aygua no retorne.	And incise that area entirely or in pieces, and especially its thin layer carefully, for if you do not examine the incision meticulously, there is no assurance that the water will not return.
Mays si le huou procezeys de aquela defora de la sua codena en la ora de la tua operacio, lahoras quan tu auras complida la seccio del ciphac, retorna dedintz aquel, e aprop ajusta las doas labias de la codena dels genetius am sutura, e aprop cura aquel ayssi cum las autras plagua, entro que sia sanat.	But if the procedure proceeds from that outside of its membrane during the time of your operation, after you have completed the incision of the white line, return inside it, and then adjust the two lips of the pubis membrane with sutures, and then treat it as you would other wounds until it is healed.
E si atrobas le huou corromput per autra malautia, lahoras cove que tu lies les vayssels les quals so sore le suspensori, e extrat le huou, e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit.	And if you find the organ corrupted by another illness, then it is necessary for you to ligate the vessels that are above the suspension, and remove the organ, and then treat it as we have said.
Mays si l’aygua es agreguada en doas partidas esemps, lahoras sapias que doas son las ernias; donc inscideys aquela partida segon que has feyt en l’autra engualment; e si es a tu vist que sia una opera, lahoras tu la fay.	But if the water is accumulated in two separate parts, then you will know that there are two hernias; therefore, incise that part as you did with the other equally; and if it appears to you that an operation is necessary, then you should perform it.
E aprop tu abstergiys le sanc, e entramet en las seccios lana submersa en oli o en oli rozat; e pausa deforo autra lana la qual tu as submersa en vi e oli, e expandeys aquela sobre dos genetius e·l mirac del ventre; e pausa desobre draps doblatz e pulvils, e lia aquels desobre am liament le qual es segon aquesta forma:	After you have wiped away the blood, immerse wool in oil or rose oil; then place another piece of wool that you have immersed in wine and oil over the two thighs and the area around the belly; cover this with folded cloths and powder, and bind all of these together as follows:
e aprop sian preses dos draps e sian humplitz de lana carmenada segon aquesta semblansa; e sian faytas las extremitatz am les quals es premut de coto o de lana humida, e sian agreguatz am strectura en le braguier de las braguas, e la una de las extremitatz prengua del cul entro al dos, e la segonda prengua a la partida del pantenilh, e dos extramitatz sobre dos coyssas dejos e dos extramitatz autras sobre dos angonars, e tota extrictura sia ajustada en le braguier de las braguas.	Then take two cloths and fill them with crimped wool according to this pattern; make the ends so that they press against the skin or moistened wool, and attach them to the structure at the waistband of the trousers, one end reaching into the cleft of the buttocks, the other extending to the groin area, and two ends over each thigh, and all attachments should be securely fastened to the waistband of the trousers.
E alcunas veguadas aquesta hernia es medicada artificialment am cauteri en loc de seccio am ferr; e es que tu prenguas cauteri cutellar subtil e que inscidas am aquel la codena dels ginitius, e es ignit segon que havem recomtat entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc contenent la aygua, e lahoras tu pren cauteri segon aquesta forma:	In some cases, this hernia is treated artificially with cautery instead of surgery with a knife; you should take a thin scalpel-like cautery and incise along the root of the groin, and it is ignited as we have recommended until the white substance containing the fluid becomes visible. Then you take a cautery in the following form:
e es asemblat a letra greca.	and it is shaped like the Greek letter.
E aprop perfora am aquel ciphac, e es ignit entro que tota la humiditat sia fora-gitada.	Then pierce that white substance with it, and ignite it until all the moisture has been expelled.
E aprop exten le ciphac am uncis, e excorja am uncis, e excorja am cauteri subtil ignit; e inscideys aquel segon que es a tu possible entro que eradiques tot lu; e guarda te del huou que·l foc no·l toque.	Then extend the white substance with hooks and remove it with hooks, and cauterize with a thin ignited cautery; incise as much as you can while ensuring that all of it is removed, and be careful that your hand does not touch the fire.
E sapias que aquesta operacio es pus salva e pus longinqua de flux de sanc, e milhor que operacio am seccio.	And know that this operation is safer and longer-lasting than bleeding, and better than dry cutting.
Mays si a tu fa contrarietat apostema caut en la hora de seccio o en hora de cauteri, o flux de sanc, lahoras cove que tu cures qual contrarietat fa a tu per aquo, am curacio la qual conveneys a lu segon que es dit.	If there is opposition to you in the form of an abscess at the time of cutting or cauterization, or bleeding, then choose the times when these oppose you least, and use the treatment that suits you best according to what has been said.
Mays si le malaute es pauruc, e no spera la segonda operacio per la sua horribilitat, lahoras administra perforacio segon que yeu recomti aquo; e es quan es certificat deves tu, per aquo que havem dit de las significacios, que aquela hernia es ayguosa.	But if the patient is weak and does not wish to undergo a second operation because of its horror, then administer puncture as I recommend; and this is when you are certain, from what we have said about the signs, that the hernia is serous.
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute sobre alcuna cezelha elevada, aprop perfora le apostema en la partida pus bassa de lu am spatum lat, e pausa la perforacio segon la longitut del cos.	Then it is necessary for the patient to sit on some raised support, and you should puncture the abscess at its lowest part below the navel, and place the incision according to the length of the body.
E sia la apercio ampla entro que corro tota l‘aygua.	And let the aperture be wide enough for all the fluid to drain out.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc coto e lia aquel e layssa aquel, per so que corro le romanent de l’aygua.	And then make an incision near the edge and ligate it there so that the remaining fluid can drain out.
E aprop cura aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	And then treat it so that the wound heals.
Mays si contrarietat es a la egrecio de l’aygua en aquela hora tu perforas aquela: e aquo no es fayt sino per aquo quar le pannicol blanc en le orrifici de la plagua fa contrarietat e prohibeys le eyssiment de l’aygua, lahoras cove que tu metas en la plagua pena o instrument am la qual es extrayta l’aygua dels ydropitz, la forma del qual es precedida; o ajusta en la opprecio de la plagua un petit.	But if there is opposition to the escape of fluid at that time when you puncture it: and this happens only because the white fat in the wound opening opposes and prevents the outflow of fluid, then you should place in the wound a straw or instrument with which water from blisters is extracted, as described; or apply slight pressure to the wound with something small.
E sapias que l’aygua retorna, e es agueguada aprop vi meses o enaviro aquels; e cum es agreguada, lahoras sia perforat segon aquela meteyssa manieyra, quar le malaute ayssi passara les sieus dias.	And know that the water returns, and it is placed for about five months or so; and when it has been set aside, then it should be pierced according to that method, because in this way the patient will have passed his days.
Capitol .lxiii.	Chapter LXIII.
De seccio sobre hernia carnosa e la curacio de lu.	On the section about flesh hernia and its treatment.
Sapias que en la seccio sobre aquesta hernia es temor perdusent a pernicia en las majors disposicios; per que a mi es vista la dimissio de lu e esser salvat per aquela milhor.	Know that in the section about this hernia, there is great fear of danger in major cases; therefore, in my view, abandoning it and being saved by that better method.
E yeu so rememorant la operacio en aquela e las specias dels apostemas.	And I am recalling the operation on that and the specifics of the abscesses.
Donc, dic que l‘apostemas natz en les cos dels quals les genetius so conponutz e es fayt aquo per motas causas: o per superfluitat aguda agra, la qual es efundida als genetius, o per percuscio.	Therefore, I say that abscesses occur in those parts where the genitals are composed, and this is done for various reasons: either due to acute, sharp excess which is discharged into the genitals, or due to impact.
E es la color de la apostema segon la color del cos, e no es atrobat en lu dolor, e es apostema greu.	And the color of the abscess is according to the color of the skin, and there is no relief from the pain, and it is a severe abscess.
E fort leu es apostema lapificada, del qual la color es fosca, e no es centiment a lu.	And when the abscess becomes stone-like, its color is dark, and there is no comfort from it.
E alcunas veguadas es fayt per nodacio de las arcerias, e per imflacio de aquelas ayssi quo ja es perceubut la rememoracio de lu, o per imflacio de venas.	And sometimes it is caused by the binding of the arteries, and by the swelling of those that are already perceived from the memory of it, or by the swelling of veins.
Mays aquo que es per imflacio de arcerias es conogut per la dispercio de la apostema quan compremas aquela am les tieus ditz; e no cove que aquel toques.	But what is caused by the swelling of arteries is known by the dispersion of the abscess when you press it with your fingers; and there is no need for that part to be touched.
Mays aquel que es fayt per imflacio de vena no es dispergut de lu alcuna causa deves la compressio am les ditz.	May it be known that what is done by inflating a vein does not disperse for any reason due to the compression of the said vein.
E ja es possible que sobre aquesta specia sia fayta seccio e sobre les autres carns; e es que tu inscida la codena dels genetius, e aprop esten le huou a las partidas desus, e extratz aquel del ciphac blanc, e deliura le suspensori dels vaysels, e ligua les, e inscideys le suspensori pus que tu deliuras aquel de tota partida de las partidas del huou.	And it is possible to perform a section on this particular area and on other flesh; you should incise the tendon of the genitii, and immediately place the fat above the sections, extract the white lymph, deliver the suspensory ligaments of the vessels, tie them up, and incise the suspensory ligaments after delivering it from all parts.
Donc si l’huou ja es am aquelas carnadas consolida, lahoras cove que tu extraguas le huou e inscidas aquel.	Therefore, if the fat has already consolidated with that flesh, now it is necessary for you to extract the fat and incise it.
E si es adherencia entro alcuna causa del ciphac, o entre aquo que es entre les bayssels, lahoras cove que tu deliures tota aquela adherencia e inscidas aquela per inscizio redonda.	And if there is an adhesion between any part of the lymph or between what is between the vessels, now it is necessary for you to deliver all that adhesion and incise it with a round incision.
Mays si es nativitat de carn en le loc de la adherencia la qual es detras, lahoras cove que tu inscidas tot aquo que es de lu, e extraguas le huou ayssi cum havem dit.	But if it is a growth of flesh in the location of the adhesion that is behind, now it is necessary for you to incise all of that, and extract the fat as we have said.
Donc cum es complida la tua operacio, lahoras omple la plagua de lana imfuza en oli rozat e vi; e aprop cura aquela am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	Therefore, when your operation is complete, now fill the wound with wool infused in olive oil and wine; then treat it with the other methods until it is healed.
Capitol .lxiv.	Chapter .lxiv.
De la curacio de hernia que es de vitz.	On the treatment of hernias that involve the testicles.
Vit es apostema envolut per alcuna envolucio semblant a broto am mollificacio dels testiculs, e es fayt dificil movement exercitiu e deambulacio sobre le malaute.	It is an abscess wrapped in some kind of covering similar to a boil on the soft tissue of the testicles, and it makes exercise and walking painful.
E en la curacio de aquesta malautia es per temor per aquo del qual es precedida rememoracio.	In the treatment of this disease, one must be cautious because it is preceded by a reminder of what caused it.
Empero cove que diguam opperacio en aquela segon que fero les primiers.	However, they must perform the operation as they did in the beginning.
E dic que cove que fassas sezer le malaute sobre una cezelha elevada; e aprop enpelleys le suspensori dels testiculs a las partidas dejos; e aprop te la codena dels genetius am les tieus ditz am les baysels que so probdas a la vergua; e tengua aquels autre ministre que tu, e extenda aquels am extencio vehement.	And he says that you should make the patient sit on a raised stool; then apply bandages to suspend the testicles below; and then take hold of the genitalia with your hands and wrap them tightly around the penis as far as you judge appropriate; and have another assistant help you, stretching them out vigorously.
E aprop inscideys am spatum lat agut per seccio traversa en le dreyt dels vaysels entro que sian les vayssels descubertz.	Then incise with a sharp, narrow blade in a transverse section between the veins so that the vessels are exposed.
E aprop excorja de tota partida ayssi quo a tu havem dit en extraccio de arceria las quals so en las templas.	Then carefully remove it completely as we have said in the extraction of arteries, which is done on flaps.
