And if the midwife is skilled and does what she does with ease and skill, whether quickly or slowly, and acts according to every figure as it is prepared for childbirth, leading to health.
Rememoratio eius quod formatur in matrice ex embrionibus et Abortiuntur.	Recollection of that which is formed in the womb from embryos and is miscarried.
Alcunas veguadas son formatz en la mayre un, e dos, e tres, e quatre, e v, e vi, e vii, e mays x, e ja es deves mi verificat que una femna abortem ne getet vi, e una autra x totz formatz, la qual causa fo fayta per mensuracio dels glorios savis.	Sometimes they are formed in the mother one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, and sometimes ten, and it has been verified for me that a woman miscarries at six months, and another at ten months, all formations, the cause of which was determined by the measurement of the wise.
E tot aysso cove que sia en la sciencia de la matrona quar fort leu ad aquela parve semblant de aquo, e donc opause se ad aquo am so que cove.	And all of this must be known by the midwife as it is crucial for accurately recognizing such cases, and thus one should proceed with what is necessary.
Capitol .lxxvi.	Chapter LXXVI.
De extraccio del fet quan es mort.	On the Extraction of a Dead Fetus.
Quan tu curas le fet mort am aquo que havem dit en la divisio de la medicacio e no es defora eyssit, e tu yest forsat usar de opperacio am ma, lahoras cove que consideras si la femna es de sana vertut e no es am alcu dels accidentz per les quals sobre ela es temuda perdicio.	When you are treating a dead fetus as we have said in the division of medication and it has not yet been expelled, and you must use surgery to do so, then you should consider whether the woman is of sound constitution and not affected by any of those conditions for which she is feared to suffer loss.
Lahoras cove que la femna sia envessada sobre le lieyt sobre le sieu dos, e sia le cap de lu enclinat enjos e las coyssas de lu sian elevadas.	At this point, the woman should be placed on her back on the bed with her buttocks raised and her head lowered.
E·l ministre tengua aquela de doas partz o sia liada en le lieyt per so que·l cos de lu no se extenda deves la extraccio del fet.	And the minister should hold her by both legs or tie her to the bed so that her body does not extend during the extraction of the fetus.
E aprop tu humecta la boca de la mayre de lu am olis humitz e am mucellage de altea e de fenugrec e de semensa de li.	And then you should moisten the mouth of the mother with oil, honey, and mucilage made from linseed, fenugreek, and flax seeds.
E aprop unte la matrona la sua ma am aquels olis e mucellages, e aprop entrometa la sua ma am fecilitat en la mayre, e aprop cerque am la ma loc en le qual fique les uncis en le fet.	And then the midwife should anoint her hand with those oils and mucilages, and then she should gently insert her hand into the mother, and then search with her hand for the place where to hook into the fetus.
E locs convenient en aquo: adonc tu considera si le fet es preparat que deysenda sobre le sieu cap, e lahoras tu fique les uncis en les huels de lu, o en le col, o en la boca, o en le palat, o dejos la barba, o en la furcula de lu, o en les locs propdas de las costas, o dejos les ypocondres.	And the appropriate places for this are as follows: then you should consider whether the fetus is positioned to descend head first, and if so, you should place the hooks in the hands of the fetus, or in the neck, or in the mouth, or on the palate, or under the chin, or at the clavicle, or in the proper places along the ribs, or under the armpits.
Mays si le deysendiment es sobre les pes de lu, lahoras en le pentenilh, o en le mieg de las costas.	But if the descent is foot first, then in the buttocks, or in the middle of the back.
E cove que tengua le unci am la ma dreyta, e pausa la curvitat de lu en aquel loc le qual es entre les ditz de la ma senestra, e entrometa la ma am facilitat e fique le unci en alcu de aquels locs les quals havem ditz, entro que pervengua a la causa boyda.	Take the needle in your right hand and place its curvature at that point which is between the fingers of your left hand, then insert it with ease into one of those places we have mentioned until it reaches the diseased area.
E aprop pause e fique en la apposicio de lu un autre unci, o le tertz si es necessitat, per so que sia atraccio engual, e no sia extencio segon la sua rectetut tant solament.	And then place and insert another needle beside it, or a third if necessary, so that there is equal attraction, and not extension according to its straightness alone.
Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu.	And let it be avoided in all parts, so that the extraction of it is eased just as it is done with teeth during their extraction.
E cove en lu aquo que es entre lor que la extencio sia mollificada; e si alcuna partida de lu es retenguda, lahoras cove que la matrona unte alcus sieus ditz am oli e entrometa aquels espertament e revolva am aquels aquo que es retengut.	And it is necessary in the place where the extension should be softened; and if any part of it is retained, then the midwife should anoint some of those places with oil and insert them carefully and roll there what is retained.
Donc si la partida del fet es fora-getada, lahoras les uncis sian permudatz entra loc le qual sia pus aut; e fay aysso entro que tot le fet sia fora-getat.	Then if a part of the fetus is dislodged, the needles should be moved to a place that is more suitable; and do this until all of the fetus is dislodged.
Mays si la ma es eyssida denant l’autra, e no es possible reduzir aquela per la coartacio de lu, lahoras cove que drap sia envolopat sobre aquela; e aprop extratz aquela entro que tota sia fora-getada, e inscideys aquela o en la junctura de la ma o en le coyde.	But if the hand is dislocated in front of the other, and it is not possible to reduce it due to its contraction, then wrap a cloth around it; and afterwards extract it until it is completely dislodged, and either incise it at the joint of the hand or at the elbow.
E ayssi cove que fassas en l’autra ma e en les dos pes.	And do the same for the other hand and both feet.
Mays si le cap del fet es gran, o accideys a lu coartacio en le eyssiment, o es en le cap de lu aygua ajustada, lahoras cove que entrometa entre les ditz espatum spinos e fenda le cap e extragua la aygua, o que discroba aquel am un instrument le qual es nompnat “alundat”, la forma del qual vindra am las formas dels autres instruments en le capitol le qual es aprop aquest.	But if the head of the fetus is large, or contraction occurs during its extraction, or it is in the head of the tight water bag, then insert between the fingers and cut open the head to extract the water, or use an instrument called “alundat,” the form of which will be among the forms of other instruments in the chapter that follows this one.
E semblantment fassa si·l fet es de gran cap per natura: e lahoras cove que inscida aquel am algematu, o que prengua aquel am alunda ayssi cum havem dit; e aprop extra les osses am les forceps.	And it seems that if the bone is large by nature: then at this time it must be sawed through with a chain-saw or taken out as we have said; and next remove from the bones what remains with the forceps.
E si le cap es eyssit e es coartat deves la furcula, lahoras sia fendut entro que la humiditat la qual es en le pietz sia efunduda.	And if the bone is bent and is compressed at the fork, then it should be split so that the moisture which is in the bones may be effused.
Mays si no es complicat, ni obezeys a eyssiment, lahoras tu inscideys le cap tantost segon que a tu sira possible.	But if it is not complicated, nor does it protrude abnormally, then you should saw the bone immediately as soon as it is possible for you.
E si le dejos del ventre es apostemat o es en lu ydropici, lahoras cove que tu perfores aquel entro que corro la humiditat que es en lu.	And if the lower part of the abdomen is abscessed or in it there is dropsy, then you should puncture that area through which flows the moisture that is within.
Mays si le fet es sobre les sieus pes, lahoras la atraccio de lu es leugiera e la direccio de lu a la boca de la mayre es leugiera.	But if the bone is on the ribs, then the attraction of it is distant and the direction of it to the mouth of the artery is distant.
Mays si es coartat deves le ventre e·l pietz, lahoras cove que tu extraguas aquel am drap le qual auras envolopat sobre la tua ma, e que fendes le ventre e·l pietz entro que corra aquo que es en aquels.	But if it is compressed against the abdomen and the bones, then you should take out that blade which you have wrapped around your hand, and cut open the abdomen and the bones through which flows what is within them.
Mays si les autres membres so ostatz e torna le cap, lahoras la metrona entrometa la ma senestra; mays si la boca de la mayre es huberta, lahoras intrometa la ma en le preon de layre, e cerque am aquela le cap, e atira aquel am les ditz entro a la boca de la mayre, e aprop entrometa en lu un unci, o dos uncis, e atire lu am aquels.	But if the other members remain still and the bone returns, then place your left hand in between; but if the mouth of the artery is open, then insert your hand into the wound, and search for the bone, and pull it with the said instrument into the mouth of the artery, and then insert an inch or two inches, and pull it with those.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada per apostema caut le qual accideys a l’u, lahoras cove que no sia trebelhat sobre lu; abantz cove lahoras aministrar efusio de causas humidas grassas.	And if the mouth of the artery is compressed by an abscess that has occurred, then it should not be touched directly; instead, you should administer moist and fatty applications.
E aministre emplastres; e segua le pacient en ayguas que mollifican e humectan.	Apply plasters; and have the patient use waters that soften and moisten.
E si le fet es sobre le sieu costat, lahoras si possible es, sia agulat: e sia aministrat aquo que havem dit en le fet viu.	And if the condition is on the side, then if possible, puncture it; and administer what we have said about the living patient.
E si aquo no es possible, lahoras sia inscidit en pessas, e sia extrayt.	And if that is not possible, then cut it into pieces, and extract it.
E cove que non layssas alcuna causa dedintz de la segondina.	And make sure not to leave any cause inside for the second time.
E cum tu auras complida tota la tua opperacio, lahoras aministra aquo que havem dit de la curacio en les apostemas cautz les quals accideysso de la mayre.	And when you have completed your entire operation, then administer what we have said about the treatment for boils that are similar to those that occurred previously.
E si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras deyssendas en ayguas stipticas e aministra l’autra curacio.	And if there is bleeding, then bathe in astringent waters and administer the other treatment.
E yeu ja e vist una femna en le ventre de la qual era fet mort, e aprop sobre aquel foc autra veguada emprenhada, e aprop foc mort es le fet autre.	And I have seen a woman in whose womb there was a dead fetus, and above that focus another pregnancy occurred, and the other fetus was also dead.
Accidit al u aprop lonc temps apostema en le sieu embelic; e inflat es entro que foc ubert, e comensec a getar brac.	It happened to one who had for a long time a boil in their navel area; and it became swollen inside with a pus-filled focus, and began to discharge pus.
E yeu fu appelhat a la cura de lu, e medicat a lu per lonc temps, e la plagua no es consolidada.	And I was called to treat them, and treated them for a long time, but the plague did not heal.
Adonc yeu pausegui sobre lu de alscunas causas emplastra de forta atraccio, e eyssic de lu un os, e aprop passero alcus jorns, e eyssic un autre os; e yeu fu trop meravilhat, cum en le ventre no sia os.	Then I applied to them several causes of strong attraction in the form of plasters, and extracted one bone from them, and after a few days, extracted another bone; and I was very surprised, as there was no bone in the belly.
E adonc yeu cogitegui que eran dels osses del fet mort.	And then I thought that they were bones of the dead fetus.
Donc yeu enguisigui la plagua, e extrayssi de lu motz osses , la femna existent en las sieuas milhos disposicios, e ja visquec en tal manieyra per lonc temps, correc de lu un petit de brac.	Thus, in treating the ulcer, extract the bones from it, the female bone existing in its marrow channels, and having seen this method over a long time, he corrected it with a little hand.
E yeu no afermegui asso esser stranh, sino quar en aquo es sciensa e ajutori ad aquo que le metge artifec am la ma per curacio aministra.	And it is not strange to do so, but rather in this lies the science and aid for what the physician craftsman uses his hand to administer in treatment.
De las formas dels instrumentz que so necessaris a extrayre le fet.	Of the forms of the instruments which are necessary to extract the substance.
Forma de vertitge am la qual es uberta la mayre:	Form of a spiral in which the main one is used:
Aquesta es la forma de strenhedor en le qual so engualhatz les libres, al qual engualhament sian dos virtitges en doas extremitatz de dos futz.	This is the form of a stretcher on which he equalizes the leaves, to this equalization there are two spirals at the two extremities of two poles.
May empero aquesta virtitge cove que sia pus subtil de strictori, e sia fayt o de eba o de fust de boys.	However, this spiral should be finer than a string, and it should be made of copper or the wood of a tree.
E sia la latitut de quascun fust quays dos ditz e le marge de quascu amdos quays un dit, e la longitut de quascu es un palm e mig; e en le mieg loc de dos fustz so dos ajustaments de aquel meteys fustz les quals ja son fermatz, dels quals la longitut es la maytat de un palm e un pauc mes, e la latitut de quascu es quay dos ditz, o un pauc mes.	And the width of each pole should be two fingers, and the margin of each side should be one finger, and the length of each is a palm and a half; and in the middle of the two poles there are two adjustments made of that same wood which are already fixed, whose length is half a palm plus a little more, and the width of each is two fingers or a little more.
E aquestz dos additamentz sian entromeses en la boca de la mayre per que sia uberta am aquels quan tu revolves las doas prescriptas virtigges.	And these two attachments should be inserted into the mouth of the main one so that it can be opened by them when you revolve the two prescribed spirals.
Forma autra semblant de aquela pus subtil e pus leugiera:	Another similar form, but finer and lighter:
Sia fayta de fustz de eba o de boys segon la semblansa de forceps.	It should be made of copper or wood resembling the form of tweezers.
Mays empero en la extremitat de lu so dos additament ayssi cum vezes, e la longitut de aquels additament es quays un palm, e la latitut de quascu es dos ditz.	However, at the extremity of the bone to which it is added, do this as many times as necessary, and the length of those additions is about one palm, and the width of each is two of these.
E cum tu vols am aquels ubrir la mayre, lahoras tu fay cezer la femna sobre le lieyt les pes pendentz, ubert aquo que es entre las coyssas de lu.	And when you want to open any of them, then you should have the woman lie on her back with her legs hanging down, which is between the thighs.
E aprop obre la tua ma am le instrument ayssi cum fas am forfexs engualment segon la quantitat que vols de la aprecio de la boca de la mayre entro que la metrona fassa so que vols.	And then open your hand with the instrument as you would with scissors, equally according to the quantity that you want from the size of the opening of the womb until the metrona does what you want.
La forma de vertitge la qual diysero les antics:	The form of vertigo which the ancients described:
Forma de impellent am le qual es empellit le fet:	Form of impelling in which the feces is expelled:
Forma de amisidat2 am le qual es conterit le cap gran	Form of attachment in which the large intestine is contained
E es asemblat a forceps al qual so dentz en la extremitat, ayssi cum vezes, e alcunas veguadas es fayt lonc ayssi cum forceps segon aquesta forma, ayssi cum vezes, al qual so dentz ayssi cum dentz de ressegua am le qual es inscidit e conterit.	And it resembles forceps, at the end of which there are teeth, as many times as necessary. And some versions are made long like forceps according to this form, as many times as necessary, with teeth like those of a reed in which is incised and contained.
Forma de amesidat pauc:	Form of attachment rarely used:
Forma de unci havent una spina:	Form with a hook having a spine:
Forma de unci havent doas spinas:	Form with a hook having two spines:
Forma de forceps a la qual so dentz de cerra am le qual le cap del fet sia conterit:	Form of forceps in which the teeth are such that the head of the fetus is contained:
Forma de spatum havent dos extremitatz am le qual le cap es abscindit:	Form of spatum having two ends in which the head is divided:
Forma de dos espatums latz:	Form of two spatulas:
Totz aquels instrumentz so excersitatz, e quan mes so multiplicadas las specias de aquel e so preparadas deves le artifexs, quant es pus leugier a la sua opperacio e pus aut deves les homes per la sua quantitat.	With those instruments such exercises are performed, and when the various types of them have been multiplied and prepared by the artisans, it becomes easier for their operation and more beneficial for people according to their quantity.
E no obres de aquels instrumentz ja sia qua sia deves tu aparalhat, quar la necessitat de aquels no es excusabla.	And you should not hesitate to prepare any of those instruments, wherever they may be needed, for the necessity of them is inexcusable.
De extraccio de la segondina.	Of the extraction of the second [incisor].
Quan la segondina es retenguda deves le enfantament, lahoras cove que tu comandes a la malautae que retengua le sieu ale, e aprop fay aquela stornudar am condizi, e strenh la tua ma sobre la boca de lu e sobre las nars de lu, e si per aysso es defora eyssit, bo es.	When the second [tooth] is retained during childbirth, you should instruct the woman to pinch her nose and then sneeze under certain conditions. Place your hand over her mouth and nostrils, and if this causes it to come out by means of this action, that is good.
E sino, lahoras tu pren una ola e perfora en la cuberta un trauc e pausa en aquela erbas ubrent la boca de la mayre, ayssi cum calament e ruda e anet e camamilla e scicados arabic e cassia lignea e santaurea.	And if not, take a leaf and pierce it at the edges to place over the mouth of the mother along with medicines such as chamomile, rue, anise, camomilla (camomile), Arabian scammony, cinnamon bark, and saffron.
Totas aquestas erbas o alcunas de lor sian submersas en aygua en la ola, e pausa aquela sobre le foc.	All of these herbs or some of them should be submerged in water in the leaf, and place that over the fire.
E aprop pausa una canula de canaviera en la boca de la mayre, e tengua aquela entro que la evapor vengua a la concavitat de la mayre.	And then place a reed tube in the mother's mouth, and hold it there until the vapor reaches the mother's cavity.
E aprop fay aquela stornudar ayssi cum havem dit, e la segondina sira fora-getada am velocitat.	And then instruct her to sneeze as we have said, and the second [tooth] will be quickly expelled.
Mays si roman aprop aquesta curacio e no es eyssida, lahoras tu comanda a la matrona que submerge la sua ma sinistra en oli sizami o en micellage de altea, e aprop entrometa aquela en le conh e queresca am aquela la segondina, e cum aquela auras trobada, lahoras pren la e exten aquela pauc a pauc Mays si es annexsa en le preon de la mayre, lahoras entrometa la sua ma segon que havem recomtat, e quan aura trobat la segondina, extragua aquela petit a petit segon rectetut per so que la mayre no caja deves la atraccio vehement.	But if this treatment fails and it does not come out, then instruct the midwife to immerse her left hand in sesame oil or almond oil, and then insert it into the woman's vagina and search for the second [tooth] with it. When you find it, grasp it little by little. If it is attached to the mother’s gums, then proceed as we have recommended, and when she finds the second [tooth], extract it slowly so that the mother does not suffer from excessive attraction.
Abantz cove que sia permudada als costatz dreyt e sinestre am facilitat.	Take care that it is turned to the right and left with ease.
E aprop sia ajustat en la quantitat de atraccio, quar ela obedira e evasira de adhirencia.	And it should be adjusted in the amount of attraction, for it will obey and avoid adherence.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada, nos ja havem recomtat la curacio am sturnutacio e am medicacio de la ola am erbas.	And if the mouth of the mother is obstructed, we have already recommended treatment through sneezing and medication of the ulcer with herbs.
Mays si no es fora-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recomtadas, lahoras guarda te que no fetigues sobre aquela en iteracio de abstracio, mays empero cove que aquo que es eyssit de lu a la boca de la mayre lies a la coyssa de la femna, e aprop cristeriza aquela am enguent e tetrafarmacon; quar aquel fara poyrir aquela aprop alcus dias e sira dissolvuda e sira fora-getada.	But if it is not expelled by all the causes we have recommended, then guard against overworking on that by repeated abstraction, but rather ensure what is extruded from the mouth of the mother lies in contact with the woman's body, and subsequently treat it with enguent and tetrafarmacon; for this will cause it to be absorbed within a few days and thus dissolve and be expelled.
Mays quan se poyreys, es de lu elevada mala audor al cap, e al estomac, e aquo ledeys la malauta; e adonc cove que sian aministradas sub-fumiguacios e convenientz ad aquo.	But when it is absorbed, it rises to the head and to the stomach, and this worsens the illness; therefore, it is necessary to administer sub-fumigations and appropriate treatments for that.
Mays alcus dels Antics ja so esproatz sub-fumigacio de nazitort e de figuas seccas.	But some of the Ancients already recommended sub-fumigation with nitzot (a type of herb) and dried figs.
Forma de instrument am le qual la femna es sub-fumiguada deves la retentio de mestruas e de la segondina:	Form of an instrument with which the woman is sub-fumigated due to retention of menstruation and secondary conditions:
Sia fayta de veyre o de eram.	It should be made of wood or ivory.
E sia pausada la extremitat subtil en le conh e la extremitat ampla sobre le foc, e la sub-fumiguacio sia pausada sobre las brazas del foc.	And the narrow end should be placed in the vagina and the wide end above the fire, and the sub-fumigation should be placed on the coals of the fire.
E tengua aquela entro que sia consumida aquela sub-fumiguacio e itera·n autra.	And keep it there until the sub-fumigation is consumed, then repeat with another one.
De curacio del cul del enfant no-perforat.	On the treatment of the unopened anus of a child.
Motz enfantz naysso e les culs de lu no so perforatz, les quals ya ciphac subtil e opilat.	Some children are born with their anuses not pierced, which are small and closed.
Adonc cove a la matrona que perfore am le sieu dit aquel ciphac; e sino, perfora aquel am spatum agut, e guarda se que no toque le lacert.	Then it is necessary for the midwife to carefully pierce that mentioned opening with her finger; and if not, she should use a sharp probe to pierce it, being careful not to touch the membrane.
E aprop pause sobre aquel lana enfusa en vi e oli; e aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia senat.	And then apply lint soaked in wine and oil to it; and subsequently treat the area until it is healed.
Mays si temes que sia opilat, lahoras pausa en le trauc una canula per motz dias, e osta la quan le enfant voldra degerir.	But if you fear that it is obstructed, then insert a cannula for several days, and remove it when the child needs to pass gas.
E ja accideys oppilacio del cul per consolidacio de plagua o de apostema; adonc cove que aquela consolidacio sia inscidida, e aprop sia curada am aquo que avem dit de la curacio e del plom.	And sometimes the anus becomes obstructed due to the consolidation of an abscess or swelling; then it is necessary to incise that consolidation, and afterwards treat it as we have said regarding treatment and lead (as a cauterizing agent).
De curacio de las fistulas que endeveno dejos.	On the treatment of fistulas that occur below.
Las fistulas que endeveno en la partida dejos pus bassa so nodacio e grossetut las quals endeveno prop del cul defora o en l’espazi de la una partida.	Fistulas that occur in the lower part, close to the body or near the buttocks outside of it or in the area between them, tend to be hard and thick.
E es una fistula o motas.	And if it is one fistula or multiple.
E cum aquela nodacio es antiquada e corr de la humiditat aygosa blanca o poyridura subtil, e alcunas veguadas so de aquestas fistulas alcunas penetrantz.	And as that hardness subsides and there is a discharge of watery white liquid or subtle pus, sometimes these fistulas penetrate further.
E aquelas penetrantz so conogudas per aquo que es eyssit de aquelas per la egressio e per ventosetat; e alcunas vetz use le malaute de egressio, e fort leu es eyssit de aquelas verm.	And these penetrating ones are known by what is felt during discharge and by windiness; and sometimes the discomfort of discharge indicates that they are indeed such.
E so de aquelas fistulas alcunas veguadas en l’espazi penetrantz entro a la vesica, e entro al meat de la vergua; e so de aquelas penetrantz entro la junctura de la coyssa e entro al notz de la coeta.	Of those fistulas, some extend into the space penetrating into the bladder, and into the urethra of the penis; and some of them penetrate into the joint of the thigh and into the root of the bone.
E aquo en que es conoguda fistula penetrant entro al cul e no-penetrant, es que tu metas le tieu dit endic en le cul, e entrometas tenta subtil de eram o de ferr en la fistula quan no y es turtuositat.	And in those that are known as penetrating fistulas into the rectum and non-penetrating ones, it is when you place your finger in the rectum, and insert a fine probe of hair or iron into the fistula where there is no tortuosity.
Mays si en aquela es turtuositat, lahoras entromet en aquela tenta subtil de plom o de pels de caval entro que tu sentas la tenta o le pel en le tieu dit.	But if there is tortuosity in that area, then insert a fine probe of lead or horsehair into it until you feel the probe or hair with your finger.
E si no sentas aquela de tot ni no procezeys del trauc alcuna causa de egestio ni verm ni ventositat, ayssi cum havem dit, lahoras sapias que es no-penetrant, e lahoras coyta te a la curacio.	And if you do not feel anything of this nor find any cause for evacuation, such as worms or gas, as we have said, then you know that it is non-penetrating, and at this point the treatment should be applied.
E quan la fistula es penetrant entro a la vesica o entro al meat de la vergua, lahoras la significacio de lu es eyssiment de urina de aquela e prohibicio de lu ad aysso que·l loc am medicina sia consolidat.	And when the fistula is penetrating into the bladder or into the urethra of the penis, then the significance of this is that urine will come from it, and it prohibits such that the site must be treated to consolidate.
Mays si es penetrant entro la junctura de la coyssa o entro al os e envencio de dolor en le circuit, lahoras senhal de lu es que la tenta perve entro aqui si en lu no es turtuositat entro al os, e envencio de dolor en le circuit de la partida; e que de lu yeys poyredura tostemps; e que no val en aquela medicacio, ni es consolidada am enguent.	But if it is penetrating into the joint of the thigh or into the bone and causes pain in the area, then the sign of this is that the probe passes through here if there is no tortuosity within the bone, and causes pain in the circumference of the affected area; and that you will have pus continuously from it; and that medication does not help in this case, nor can it be consolidated by treatment.
E en totas aquelas fistulas penetrant no es curacio de tot, e la curacio de aquelas es trebalh e vanetat dels folyls metges sobre·l qual so fermatz.	And in all those penetrating fistulas, there is no complete cure, and the treatment of these is hard work and futility for physicians, as such is their fate.
Mays en aquela que no es penetrant e no antiqua, sanacio am ferr es sperada segon que yeu a tu recomtare, e aquo que ja yeu e proat.	In that which is not penetrating and not ancient, healing with iron is hoped for as I will tell you, and this which I have already promised.
E es que le malaute jagua entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos e eleva las cambas de lu entro sus, las coyssas sian enclinadas al ventre de lu, e aprop entromet tenta de plom, o de eram si es en la fistula turtuositat, entro que sapias le loc on perve la tenta.	And it is that the patient should lie between your thighs with their buttocks higher and elevate the limbs within them, the objects being inclined towards the belly of the patient, and then introduce a probe made of lead or iron if it is in the fistula tortuosity, until you know the place where the probe passes.
E si aquela sent le malaute entorn le cuol, lahora cove que tu entrometas le tieu dit endic en le cuol.	And if that is the case where the patient surrounds the anus, then you should introduce your finger into the anus.
E si sentas en le tieu dit la tenta ja per si meteyssa descuberta penetrar, otra aquo que sentas entre le tieu dit e aquela siphac o carn, lahoras sapias certanament que aquela es penetrant; e adonc no trebalhes en aquela, quar no es en aquela sanacio, ayssi cum havem dit.	And if you feel with your finger that the probe has already been discovered penetrating, or what you feel between your finger and that tube or flesh, then you know certainly that it is penetrating; and then do not work on that one, for there is no healing in that one, as we have said.
Mays empero diyssero alcus que es sana en alcus homes tart.	But some might say that it heals in some men slowly.
E de la medicacio per la qual es sperat juvament en lu es que tu ignes cauteri subtil segon le ample de la fistula, ayssi cum es precedit, e intrometas aquel ignit en la fistula entro que pervengua entorn le cuol; e aprop itera aquel doas o tres vetz entro que sapias que ja son adhustas totas aquelas carns ajustadas fistuladas que so semblantz a cana de pluma de ausel.	And for the treatment in which hope is placed is that you use a subtle cautery according to the size of the fistula, as has been described, and introduce that heated instrument into the fistula until it goes around the anus; and then repeat that two or three times until you know that all those inflamed tissues have become constricted like a feather quill.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder entro que en yescan totas aquelas carns que so adhustas, e aprop cura aquela am medicinas la carn engendrantz e consolidantz, e si es sanada, bo es; e sino, lahoras no es sana en degun temps per autra curacio.	And then treat that with poultices wrapped in cloth until all those constricted tissues heal, and then treat that with medicines that generate and consolidate the flesh, and if it heals, good; but if not, then it will not heal at any time by any other treatment.
E si la tenta intra, e no penetra entro·l tieu dit le qual es en le cul, e entre aquel e la tenta que es velament spes de carn o de ciphac, e vezes la fistula en aquo que siec la superficia de la codena, lahoras secca la codena del comensament de la fistula, e tu ve seccan am la tenta, e sia en la fistula entro que la seccio pervengua al loc en le qual perve la extremitat de la tenta, e per la tenta es liberat e catz.	And if the probe enters and does not penetrate further, tell which is in the anus, and between that and the probe there is a membrane of flesh or ciphac [type of cloth], and sometimes the fistula is on what dries the surface of the intestine. Now dry the intestine from the beginning of the fistula, and you will see it drying along with the probe, and let it be in the fistula until the drying reaches the place where the end of the probe arrives, and through the probe it is freed and cured.
E aprop mundifiqua aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so asembladas a canula de pena de ausel e no romangua de aquelas alcuna causa.	And then cleanse those fleshy parts that are affected by fistulas, which resemble an owl feather quill tube, without damaging any part of them for any reason.
Mays si flux de sanc vezes que vengua entre tu e la tua opperacio quan ensideysses aquelas carns, lahoras le milh que sia e del pus leugier instrument es cauterizar am foc o am medicina acuta, quar cauteri am foc ajusta bonas doas habitutz: so es adhustio de aquelas carns ajustadas, e abscizio del sanc exseccacio de las humiditatz.	But if blood flows between you and your operation when you are treating those flesh parts, now the method that is best and for pus an acute instrument is to cauterize with fire or with sharp medicine, because cauterizing with fire adjusts two good habits: one is the adjustment of those flesh parts being conjoined, and the other is the cessation of blood by drying out the moisture.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder o en caus trissat entro que·l loc geta brac, e aprop lahoras cura la plagua am enguentz carn dura engendran e consolidan.	And then treat that with bandages wrapped in butter or honey until the area gets better, and afterwards cure the wound with a hard flesh graft that generates and strengthens.
E so medicinas en las quals so stipticitat e exseccio; quan lahoras es restaurada ja es sanada e no temes iteracio.	And medicines that have the property of being styptic and drying; when these are restored, it is healed and you need not fear recurrence.
Mays si la fistula ja perve entro al preon del cul e es elonguada de lu superficia del cos, lahoras entromet le tieu dit en le cul e inquireys am aquel.	But if the fistula has already penetrated into the tissue around the anus and is extended from the surface of the body, now insert your finger into the anus and examine it.
E donc si centes la tenta e entre tu e ela es velament de ciphac o de carn, e es propda a la penetracio, lahora no es operacio en lu sino segon via di fiducia e de speransa.	And therefore, if you feel the probe and between it and your finger there is a membrane of cloth or flesh, and it is suitable for penetration, now there is no operation to be performed here but rather proceed with confidence and hope.
La qual causa es aministrar en lu una de tres manieyras: o que cauterize aquela ayssi cum havem dit; o que secces aquela entro que consieguas la conquavitat de lu per que sia a tu possible entrometre las qualcas e la curacio propdana; e no procesiscas mot am seccio per so que no inscidas le lacert contenent le cuol, e que accidisque sobre le malaute eyssiment de la egistio ses voluntat; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit quar fort leu sira sanat; o que elongues aquel velament e mondes aquel pus que seccas aquel entro prop le cul, ayssi cum havem dit, o am tenta o am autre instrument de aguda extremitat, e aprop mondifique aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so en la seccio entro la on podes am percrustacio; e aprop esforsa te a far la restauracio de tota la plagua am seccio, e si le orrifici pus desus no es consolidat, e romangua la fistula uberta en la partida del cul, e sira pus leugier per le malaute.	The cause of this is to be administered in one of three ways: either cauterize it as we have said; or dry it until you achieve the contraction necessary for you to introduce certain medications and proper treatment; and do not proceed with drying if it does not endanger the surrounding tissue, but perform it according to the patient's condition without causing them distress; and then treat that area with what we have mentioned so that healing may occur more easily; or lengthen that membrane and clean that pus which you dried inside near the anus, as we have said, or use a sharp instrument, and then cleanse those ulcerated tissues within the drying process where perforation is possible through pressure; and then strive to restore the entire wound by drying it out, and if the upper opening of the pus does not consolidate, and if an abscess remains in the buttocks region, it will be easier for the patient.
E alscunas veguadas la fistula es finida segon aquesta manieyra: es quan tu entrometas la tenta en la fistula, e es en le latz del cul entorn la superficia del cos am la codena e en le marge del cul, lahoras pren tenta de perforada extremitat, que es ayssi cum agulha de preparantz les coers segon aquesta forma:	And sometimes the fistula is treated in this manner: when you introduce the probe into the fistula, and it runs along the buttocks near the surface of the body around the coccyx and at the edge of the anus, take a sharp-tipped probe, which resembles a needle prepared according to this form:
e entromet en aquela fiel envolopat de v fiels o entorn aquels; e aprop entromet tenta am fiel en la fistula entro que consiegua la conquavitat de lu.	and introduce it into the affected area wrapped in five leaves or around them; and then insert the probe with the leaf into the fistula until you achieve the necessary contraction.
Mays si es penetrant en le marge del cul prop dedintz, lahoras tu extratz le fiel de aquel trauc ayssi que tu intrometas le tieu dit en le cul; e extraguas la extremitat del fiel e ajustes las duas extremitatz essemps, e estrenh cascuna, e leyssa aquo per un dia o per dos, e quan mays inscideys le fiel en la carn, estrenh be aquel entro que aquelas carns sian inscididas las quals so entre doas extremitatz del fiel e que cajan.	But if it penetrates the edge of the anus towards the interior, then you extract the leaf from that path as though you were introducing your finger into the anus; and you pull out the tip of the leaf and secure both ends firmly, and tighten each one, and leave this for a day or two, and when you later incise the leaf in the flesh, tighten it well so that those tissues between the two ends of the leaf heal.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia consolidada e sanada.	Thus the treatment of the ulcer should be such that it becomes consolidated and healed.
Mays si le orrifici de la fistula no es penetrant, lahoras fay aquel penetrar, en qualque manieyre sia a tu preparat, sino que sia mot en le preon, quar no es a tu que fassas aquo per que no inscidas le lacert; e aprop fay am aquela entro que sia sanada.	If the orifices of the fistula are not penetrable, then make them penetrable in whatever way you have prepared, but do so gently, for you should not do this to cause harm to the patient; and thereafter proceed with treatment until it is healed.
La forma de spatum spinos am lo qual es fenduda la fistula: la curvitat del qual es mot aguda e l’autra partida es no-aguda, per so que no inscidas aquo que no es necessari, ayssi cum vezes.	The shape of the spatum with a sharp spine used to incise the fistula: one part of it is sharply curved and the other part is not sharp, so as not to injure what is unnecessary, as often happens.
De sutura de emorroydas en las quals corra sanc en la inscizio de aquelas.	Regarding the stitching of hemorrhoids in which there is bleeding during the incision of those.
Emorroydas so segon dos manieyras, quar o so entre le cul semblantz aysi que es de carbos, o quays aquelas sian cum a gras de rasim.	Hemorrhoids occur in two ways: either they appear around the anus like charcoal pieces, or they are like grape clusters.
E de aquelas so petitas e grans, e que le sanc corr de aquelas tostemps e es una, e so motas, e so fora·l cul, e en las extremitatz de lu.	And they can be small and large, and blood flows from them continuously and is one type, and they appear inside the anus, and at its extremities.
Mays empero aquelas que so foro le cul so segon las mes de pauca humiditat, de las quals corr aygua citrina o un petit de sanc am cos continuabla, e so segon la color del cos.	However, those that appear outside the anus are due to less moisture, from which clear water or a little blood mixed with it flows continuously, and their color is like the color of the skin.
E la curacio de aquela que es dedintz le cuol es que comandes al malaute que se assela e que se exprema entro que le cuol yesca e las emoroydas apparescan a tu.	And the treatment for those that are inside the anus is to instruct the patient to sit down and apply pressure until the anus opens and the hemorrhoids become visible.
Adonc tu te coyte e suspen am uncis o que tenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, e aprop incideys aquelas deves las suas razitz.	Then you carefully use hooks or what you have to grasp them with your fingernail, and then cut those that need it along their roots.
Mays si les uncis no so tengutz en aquelas per la humiditat de lor e mollificacio de aquelas, lahoras pren aquelas am drap aspre o am coto o am flassada de lana, e extratz aquelas am les tieus ditz, e aprop inscideys aquelas e polveriza sobre lor alcunas polveras caudas aprop la inscizio, per que sian ad aquelas en loc de cauteri; o cauteriza aquelas segon que es precedit en le capitol de cauterizar.	If the hooks do not hold in them because of their humidity and softness, then take a rough cloth or a cot or a flaxen bandage, and extract them with the fingers mentioned, and then cut them and sprinkle certain powders close to the incision, as a substitute for cauterization; or cauterize them as is described in the chapter on cauterizing.
E aprop cura aquelas am l’autra curacio entro que sian sanadas.	And afterwards, treat them with other remedies until they are healed.
E si le cul no obezeys a egressio, lahoras cristerisa le malaute am cristeri en le qual sia mordicacio petita, e sia lavat am aquel aquo que es en le cuol e que obezesca a egressio leugierament quan le malaute s’esprem.	And if the pus does not flow out, then incise the abscess with an incision small enough for it to discharge easily when the pus is expressed.
Mays si las emorroydas so defora le cul, lahoras la causa de lor es leugiera, e es que tu prenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, o que prenguas aquelas am unci, e inscidas aquelas, e aprop cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit entro que sian sanadas.	But if the hemorrhoids are external, then their cause is easily treated, and you should take them with your fingernail or hook, and cut them, and afterwards treat them with the remedies we have mentioned until they are healed.
E aquel que avoreys inscizio, cove que aministres sutura de lor segon aquesta manieyra: pren fiel envolopat e entromet aquel en agulha e aprop extratz las emorroydas a las partidas dessus, e fay aquel penetrar am la agulha en la razit del autra part, e envolveys las doas extramitatz del fiel en la partida pus dejos de la agulha, e so latitudinalment; e estrenh la emorroyda am strectura fort, e aprop noza le fiel e extratz la agulha.	And for those who need suturing, proceed as follows: take silk thread and pass it through a needle, then extract the hemorrhoids at the top part, and make the needle penetrate to the other side of the incision, wrap both ends of the silk around the area below the needle horizontally; tighten the hemorrhoid firmly with strong pressure, and then tie off the silk and remove the needle.
E fay aquo a totas, e layssa de aquelas una e no la cozes, per so que la superfluitat del sanc corra de aquela.	And do this for all of them, leaving one open and not suturing it, so that the excess blood can flow out from it.
E aprop pausa sobre le cul drap enfus en oli rozat o en cerot; e pausa aquel sobre·l cuol e comanda al malaute que·s repause.	And then apply a cloth soaked in rose oil or cerate to it; place that on the affected area and instruct the patient to rest.
E aprop layssa aquela entro que caja; e quan es casuda, cura aquelas am enguentz o am autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	If you find it in there where it has entered; and when it is enclosed, treat those which are found or with another treatment until it is healed.
De curacio de fistulas.	On the Treatment of Fistulas.
Motas veguadas accideys per exseccacio de fenda o per costriccio de natura.	Frequently, accidents occur due to the splitting of a fissure or constriction of nature.
E cum so antiquadas e no val en aquela medicina, lahoras cove que tu razas aquelas am la puncta de spatum o am la tua ungla entro que sian faytas humidas e sia hostada de aquelas la escorsa pus desus, la qual prohibeys aquelas de consolidacio; e aprop cura aquelas entro que sian consolidadas.	And when they become old and do not benefit from that medicine, now you should scrape those off with the edge of a spatula or with your fingernail until they are made wet and pus is discharged from them, which prevents their consolidation; and then treat them until they are consolidated.
Lahoras tu osta aquelas am razio pus vehement que la primieyra entro que mot sancno e sian excoriadas; e aprop cura aquelas entro que sian sanadas.	Now you should scrape off those with more vigorous pus removal than the first time until some bleeding occurs and they are sufficiently scraped; and then treat them until they are healed.
De curacio de almesamir, so es clau.	On the Treatment of Hemorrhoids, which is a Key Topic.
Sapias que alamermar, so es clau, e no es si no notz redon segon la color del cors semblant a cap de claviel, e es fayt en tot le cors e majorment en las partidas dejos les pes e als ditz, e endeve per aquels dolor deves le anament.	Know that alamermar, which is a key ingredient, and it is nothing but red spots similar in color to the body and resembling clove buds, and they are found all over the body but mostly below the waist and around them, and from these you should alleviate the pain.
E adonc cove que sia inscidit aquo que es en le circuit del clau, e sia tengut am les forfexs o am unci, e sia eradicat de la sua razit; e aprop cura aquel.	Then you should incise what is within the area of the key, and hold it with tweezers or forceps, and eradicate it from its root; and then treat that area.
E si vols, cauteriza le segont que es precedit en le sieu capitol.	And if you wish, cauterize the following as described in its chapter.
Mays de veruca es eminencia petita aspre fistulada redonda sobre la superficia del cos, e motas veguadas veno en las mas dels enfantz.	But a verruca is a small, rough, fistulated, round elevation on the surface of the body, and they frequently occur in most children.
E curacio de lu es que estendas e inscidas aquela, o que estrenhas aquela am fiel o am pel entro que caja.	Of the treatment of the place which is stretched and cut there, that which restrains it with a thread or with hair that encloses.

E ja so eradicadas enversas e no-enversas am le instrument le qual yeu diyre.	And now the excrescences opposite and non-opposite with the instrument of which I shall speak.
Mays formica es eminencia petita feutrada o fistulada grossa sobre la superficia del cos anant mot en le preon, e quan le freg atroba aquela es centit en lu semblant de mordificacio de formigua, e es fayta entorn le cos.	A worm called a furuncle is a small raised or fistulated swelling on the surface of the body that itches intensely, and when scratched it becomes inflamed like an ant bite, and spreads around the body.
E curacio de lu es que prenguas una canula de pena de auca o de pena de voltor, e sia fort, e pausa aquela sobre la formigua entro que la contengua le cercle de la canula de las partidas de lu; e aprop revolveys la tua ma am la canula entro que inscidas aquo que es en le circuit de la formigua, e pauses aquela en le preon de la carn, e que eradiques la formigua de la sua razit.	The treatment for it is that you take a needle of eagle feather or vulture feather, and let it be strong, and place that on the worm (furuncle) such that it contains the circle of the needle around its parts; and then rotate your hand with the needle such that you cut what is in the circuit of the worm, and place it in the itching of the flesh, and so eradicate the worm from its root.
E si vols, fay aquo am canula de eram o de ferr segon aquesta forma:	And if you want, do this with a needle of iron or of steel in this manner:
Sia la partida desus de la canulha trahent a subtilitat, sorda (so es no-perforada), envolopada per so que sobre le dit la aprencio de lu sia ablaviada e la revolucio de aquela.	Let the end above of the needle be drawn to sharpness, blunt (that is not perforated), wrapped in such a way that on the finger it appears blunted and its rotation is controlled.
E si vols cauteriza la formiga segon que es denant dit en la cauterizacio de atheyl en le capitol de cauteri.	And if you want to cauterize the worm (furuncle) according to what was said before in the chapter on cauterization.
De forma dels instrumentz que so aministratz a dar cristeri.	Of the forms of the instruments that you administer to patients.
Alcunas veguadas es fayt cristeri de argent o de lato o de eram fondut o malleat; e alcunas veguadas es fayt de aquels instrumentz petit e gran segon aquels als quals so aministratz, quar aquel que es aministrat en la curacio dels petitz enfants sia petit; e de aquel dels quals los culs son freuls o doloyrozes, les cristeris de aquels sian petitz.	Some instruments are made of silver or lead or melted and hammered metal; and some instruments are made small or large according to those to whom they are administered, for the one who is treated in the cure of small children should have small ones; and for those whose rectums are narrow or painful, their instruments should be small.
La forma de cristeri gran e pauc:	The form of the large and few crucibles:
Le cap de la canula de lu desus en le qual es liada la borsa sia ampla segon aquesta manieyra; e sia a lu distinacio la on la borsa es liada ayssi cum vezes.	The top of the copper tube above which the bag is tied should be wide according to this method; and it should be at the place where the bag is tied as you see.
E la extremitat de lu pus dejus, la qual es entromesa en le cul, sia sorda (so es no-uberta) mot leon, atrasent a subtilita; e en la un del latz de lu sian dos traucs, e en l’autre costat un trauc, e sia la amplesa del trauc segon la groseza dels rays e pus gros un petit.	And the end of the tube below, which is inserted into the rectum, should be blunt (that is, not open) like a lion's tail, tapering slightly; and on one side of it there are two grooves, and on the other side one groove, and the width of the groove should be according to the thickness of the rays and somewhat thicker.
E sia la borsa en la qual sian pausadas las medicinas de vesica de bestia o de pel de ovelha, e la razit de lu sia un palm.	And the bag in which the medicines are placed should be made of animal bladder or sheepskin, and the length of the bag should be one palm.
E sia perforada per motz traucs ayssi cum es revolvuda; e si l’espazi le qual es entre les traucs la grossetut del dit.	And it should be perforated with threads as it is twisted; and if the space between the threads is as thick as a finger.
E aprop entromet en aquels traucs fiel fort de fiel cru le qual sia de detz fiels, o enviro aquels; e ajusta am aquel la borsa; e quan es pausada en lu la borsa, sia streyt en le cap del cristeri entre dos distingentz am fort costriccio, e aprop cristeriza am aquel quascun trauc: Mays la qualitat de cristerizar am aquel es que tu omples la borsa de la medicina, que sia escalfada segon la quantitat de la tolleransa del malaute; e guarda te que no sia trop cauda ni trop freja.	And then insert into those threads strong wax from fresh wax, which should be of this amount or so; and tie the bag tightly; and when the bag is placed on it, it should be tight at the top of the instrument between two distinct points with a strong knot, and then seal each thread: But the quality of sealing it is that you fill the bag with medicine according to the quantity that the patient can tolerate; and beware that it is not too hot nor too cold.
E aprop le malaute sia resupinat sobre le sieu dos, e eleva las suas cambas en sus e pausa dejos lu un cuer sobre le qual ja so les homes o un lansol; e aprop unta la extramitat del cauteri am oli o am album de huou o am mucellage de fenugrec o de semblantz; e aprop entromet aquel en le cul am facilitat, e aprop le ministre prengua la borsa e exprema aquel am doas mas e essemps am vehemencia entro que sia evacuat en le budelh tot aquo que es en le cristeri; e aprop extra le cristeri e le malaute leva las suas cambas a la paret.	Let the patient lie on their back, and raise her buttocks with something beneath them like a cushion or pillow; then smear the tip of the cautery with oil or egg white or fenugreek mucilage or similar; then gently introduce it into the anus; then the assistant should take the bag and squeeze it vigorously until everything that is in the womb has been evacuated from the bowel; then remove the instrument and let the patient lower her buttocks to the ground.
E si la medicina forsa aquel a eyssiment, tengua le tant quant poyra; e si dorm am aquel per tota una nueyt, es mays derier en juvament.	And if the medicine forces her to evacuate, let it do so as much as possible; and if she sleeps with it for a whole night, it is better for recovery.
Mays si tu cristerizas aquel en las malautias de solucio de ventre e l’eyssiment de lu le coyta, lahoras tu itera le cauteri entro que sia sanat.	But if you treat her for abdominal disorders and evacuation of the bowels, then repeatedly use the cautery until she is healed.
E si en le cul so emorroydas o apostemas ledens, lahoras sia le cristeri mot subtil e leon, dels cristeris am les quals les enfantz so criterisatz.	And if there are hemorrhoids or abscesses in the anus, then use a subtle and soft womb cloth, like those used for babies.
De curacio de las plaguas.	On the treatment of plagues.
Yeu ja e dit en la divisio de la curacio de las plaguas aquo que convenia al libre, e yeu dic assi la curacio de aquelas am ma e am medicinas segon le conpliment.	I have already stated in the division of the treatment of plagues what was appropriate for the book, and I will now describe the treatment of those with the plague using medicine according to the regimen.
Donc dic que las plaguas son diversificadas segon aquo en que son faytas las plaguas e segon le loc sobre le qual cazo las plaquas.	Therefore, I say that plagues are diverse according to what causes the plagues and according to the location where the plague occurs.
E las causas per que motas vetz son faytas las plaguas so ayssi cum getament de peyra, o inscisio d’espaza o de cotel, o percussio am lansa, o am fustz, o am sageta, o semblantz ad aquels de motas causas.	And the causes for which such wounds are made by plagues are like throwing stones, or cutting with a sword or knife, or striking with a lance, or a stick, or an arrow, or similar to those from various causes.
Mays las plaguas que so en les locz del cos so ayssi cum plagua la qual catz sobre le cap, o·l col, o·l pietz, o·l ventre, o·l fitge, e semblantz ad aquels dels membres.	Here are the plagues that occur in the parts of the body such as the plague which spreads over the head, neck, feet, abdomen, groin, and similar ones in the limbs.
E yeu so recomtant la curacio de alcunas plaguas per que pauses aquela ratiocinacio e regla sobre las autras plaguas.	And for that reason I recommend the treatment of certain plagues, so that you pause that reasoning and rule over other plagues.
E yeu comensare de las plaguas del cap simplas, quar la rememoracio de las compostas vindra al comensament del tertz capitol.	And I will begin with the simple plagues of the head, for the memory of the compound ones will come at the beginning of the third chapter.
Donc dic que quan accideys en le cap plagua simpla e no es fractura, lahoras considera: si es per getament de peyra o de semblant, e ja ha trinquada la codena tant solament e es gran plagla e temes sobre aquel malaute havinement de apostema caut, lahoras tu te coyta e fleubotoma la cephalica tantost, e no tardas aquo; e extrats ad aquel del sanc segon la quantitat de la vertut de lu si no mes alcuna causa prohibent de fleubotomia, majorment si·l sanc que es eyssit de la plagua es pauc.	Therefore, I say that when a simple plague occurs on the head and it is not a fracture, you should consider: if it is due to being hit by a stone or something similar, and if only the skin has been broken and there is a large wound and you fear that an abscess may form, then immediately apply cupping and do phlebotomy on the cephalic vein without delay; do not postpone this unless there is some prohibiting cause for phlebotomy, especially if little blood comes out of the wound.
E sia la flaubotomia del contrari de la partida plaguada; e guardase le malaute de replecio e de vi e de viandas grossas.	And let the phlebotomy be on the opposite side of the affected part; and keep the patient from overeating, wine, and heavy foods.
Mays si de la minuicio prohibeys alcuna causa, lahoras sia aminorat de la vianda e no apropinque a carn ni a vi.	But if some minor cause prohibits it, then reduce the amount of food and do not allow meat or wine.
E pausa sobre la plagua, si a lu accideys apostema caut, coto enfus en oli rozat solet o en vi en le qual es stipticat.	And pause treatment on the wound if an abscess forms, and apply it only to oil that has been lightly heated or to wine that has been stypticized.
Mays si est segur de apostema caut, lahoras pausa sobre la plagua, si es recent am le sieu sanc e le ayre no ha mudat aquela la polvera la qual yeu recomtare aprop petit.	But if you are sure that an abscess will form, then pause treatment on the wound if it is fresh and the blood has not clotted, and the air has not changed the powder that I recommend to apply sparingly.
E si le ayre ja ha mudada aquela, lahoras pausa sobre alscus enguentz entro que sia sanada.	And if the air has already changed that, pause then until some signs appear indicating it is healed.
Mays si la plagua es gran o es per inscizio d’espaza e de semblantz, e no so ajustadas las labias de lu per puvils, lahoras ajusta aquelas am sutura segon que yeu recomtare de la sutura de lor.	And if the wound is large or due to the separation of tissues and similar conditions, and if the edges of the wound cannot be brought together with forceps, then adjust those using a suture as I will explain regarding the suturing of such wounds.
Mays si la plagua ja es discuberta del os e pen, e no es retencio de lu sino un petit suspensori, lahoras inscideys aquela e aprop cura la plagua am medicinas e restaura la carn aprop en loc de codena, e comanda al malaute que sia pescut de viandas en las quals es groceza: caps e formen coyt e semblantz a lor, entro que sia compost.	And if the wound is already exposed to the bone and beneath it, and there is no need for much support but only a small suspender, then incise that and immediately treat the wound with medicines and restore the flesh in place of the dressing, and instruct the patient to eat food that is nutritious: meat and foods similar to it, until recovery.
E si atrobas en la codena putrefaccio e no adhereys al os, lahoras tu inscideys tot aquo poyrit e geta aquo, e aprop cura aquo.	And if you find putrefaction in the dressing and it does not adhere to the bone, then incise all that is rotten and remove it, and immediately treat it.
Mays si en aquestas plaguas es arteria o vena de la qual fluxs de sanc pot evenir, e no es abscindida per medicinas, lahoras tu inquier sobre la arteria, e si atrobas aquela no-inscidida, lahoras tu inscideys aquela am spatum, o lia aquela; e si necessitat te provoca que aquo que havem dit no comfereys, lahoras tu cauteriza entro que·l sanc sia abscidit.	And if in these wounds there is an artery or vein from which blood flow can occur, and it cannot be stopped with medicines, then you should inquire about the artery, and if you find that it has not been cut, then you should cut it with a scalpel, or ligate it; and if necessity compels you and what we have said does not suffice, then you should cauterize until the bleeding is stopped.
E si aquestas plaguas son simplas e petitas, lahoras la causa de lor es leugiere; enayssi que tu polverizas sobre aquelas aquesta polvera, quar consolidada aquela denant que l’ayre mude aquelas.	And if these wounds are simple and small, then the cause of them is minor; sprinkle this powder over them, as it will consolidate those before the air changes them.
E la manieyra de la polvera es aquesta: recipe oli de enses partida una, de sanc de drago partida doas, de caus no-extincta partidas tres; sia tot mot trissat e crivellat, e de lu sia la plagua omplida, e sia constrengida per bona constriccio entro que be sobre aquela aderesca, e sia coagulada am le sanc.	And the method for the powder is as follows: take oil of henbane one part, dragon's blood two parts, and burnt frankincense three parts; mix them thoroughly and sift them, then fill the wound with it, and bind it tightly so that it adheres well to the dressing, and let it coagulate with the blood.
E aprop strengeys aquela desus am pulvils e leyssa aquela, e no la deslias mentre esta ayssi que no es apostemada, quar no es eredicada de lu la medicina entro que sia sanada.	From above the wound apply poultices and leave them on it, and do not loosen them while it is still such that it has not become an abscess, for medicine does not heal it until it is cured.
E alcuna vetz fa aquo sola cautz, quan no es a tu en present enses e sanc de drago.	And sometimes this single cautery is done when it is not within your reach to get the blood and sweat of a dragon.
E ja fa aquesta meteyssa operacio en las grans plaguas quan conveneys que sia pausada sobre aquelas e sian streytas, e so plaguas recentz am le lor sanc, las quals le ayre no ha alteradas.	And this method of operation is performed on large wounds when it is necessary to place them in a position and make them narrow, and for fresh wounds with their blood, which the air has not altered.
E si le ayre las ha alteradas, e majorment quan es en temps d’estiu, lahoras no es entencio a la posicio de aquesta polvera, mays adonc cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit, enayssi que tu pauses sobre aquelas alcus enguents degistius, o que pauses sobre aquelas pols de la farina del ordi am aygua e mel entro que getan poyredura; e aprop cura aquelas am l’autra curacio entro que sian sanadas.	And if the air has altered them, especially when it is in summer time, then there is no intention to place this powder, but at that time treat these as we have said, placing on them some cooling substances or placing on them flour of barley mixed with water and honey until they begin to rot; and afterwards treat these with the other treatment until they are healed.
Mays si accideys am la plagua fractura en os, e es petita, lahoras tu extratz aquo am gesti.	But if it happens that the wound is a fracture in the bone, and it is small, then you extract that with a forceps.
E yeu diyre la cura de las fracturas del cap en aquo que es envenidor.	And I say the treatment of fractures of the head in what is poisonous.
De las plaguas del col.	Of wounds of the neck.
Mays si la plagua accideys en le col, lahoras no es en lu differencia en medicacio, e entre la plagua del cap quan es simpla.	But if the wound happens in the neck, then there is no difference in treatment, and between the wound of the head when it is simple.
Mays si ja le nervi del col es inscis o arteria, lahoras si es nervi, no es en lu engen sino que sia evitada curacio de lu am aquo que fa vehement stipticitat, ayssi cum ziniar e zegi que es vetriol e semblantz a lor quar nozo als nervis e contrazo aquel.	But if the nerve of the neck is cut or an artery, then if it is a nerve, there is no cooling treatment but rather it should be avoided and treated with something that strongly constricts, such as zinc ore and similar substances that adhere to nerves and contract them.
E no pauses sobre la plagua alcuna causa de tot freja, quar la sustancia dels nervis es freja e la continuacio de lu es am le cervel, le qual es le pus aut de totz les membres.	Do not linger over any cause of worry, for the substance of the nerves is spread out and their continuation is in the brain, which is the source of all members.
E si’ aquo am que es curat de medicinas leugieras, ayssi cum es caus lavada am aygua dousa, alcuna veguada enfusa en oli rozat o no-rozat, e thucia quan es lavada am aygua dousa e las autras peyras minarantz segon aquesta manieyra, e enguentz humitz.	And if he is being treated with leeches, as is often done with warm water, and sometimes immersed in rose oil or non-rose oil, and then washed with warm water while the other stones are applied according to this method, and moisture is found.
Mays si la plagua es gran, lahoras aministra sutura, o coarta las labias de lu, e aprop cura aquela am pulvils entro que sia sanada.	But if the wound is large, then administer stitches, or bind the edges of it, and subsequently treat it with powders until it is healed.
Mays si a la plagua es profunditat o accideys en lu a la pus bassa partida poyredura, lahoras perfora aquela en le loc mays depremegut.	But if the wound is deep or there is corruption at its lowest part, then puncture it in the most depressed place.
Mays si en la plagua ja es inscisa arteria e es conseguit flux de sanc, lahoras separa o secca aquela, o lia aquela, o cauteriza aquela si necessitat te provoca ad aquo.	But if an artery is cut in the wound and bleeding occurs, then tie off or cauterize it, or ligate it, or cauterize it if necessity demands it.
Mays si ja ha insciditz les spondils del golayro o tot, e so salvadas las venas del col, lahoras tu ajusta las labias de la codena am sutura sobre la cana del golayro e no toques aquel; abantz egala aquel e reduzeys aquel sobre la sua figura natural, e aprop strenh aquel am strectura decent, e leyssa aquela per alcus jorns; e aprop cura aquel am enguentz en les quals es stipticitat e excitacio entro que sia sanat.	But if the vertebrae of the neck or the entire spine have already been cut, and only the veins of the neck remain intact, then you should bring the edges of the wound together with sutures over the bone of the neck without touching it; instead, equalize it and reduce it to its natural shape, and afterward strengthen it with proper support, and leave it for several days; subsequently treat it with substances that are astringent and stimulating until it is healed.
Mays si la plagua ja en le os a fayta enprecio, lahoras percuireys aquela, e lahoras si en lu ha fragmentz de hos, extratz totz aquels que podes de lor; e aquo que a tu no es apparelhat, leyssa aquo entro que la plagua se poyrisca, e sia separat e la egrecio de lu sia alleujada.	But if the wound has already become inflamed in the bone, then probe it, and if there are fragments of bone in it, remove all that you can; and what is not accessible to you, leave it until the wound becomes pus-filled, and the inflammation subsides.
E si la plagua es recent lahoras polveriza sobre aquela polvera la qual t’e recomtada.	And if the wound is recent, sprinkle over it the powder which has been recommended.
Mays si en la plagua es fayta fistula, lahoras cura aquela am aquo del qual la rememoracio vindra aprop en le sieu capitol.	And if a fistula has formed in the wound, then treat it with the liquid whose description will be found later in its chapter.
De las plaguas del col o de semblantz quan fayta entre las spallas e es fayta am spaza o am cotel o am lansa o am semblantz.	About wounds of the neck or similar ones that are made between the shoulders, whether with a spear, sword, lance, or similar weapon.
Si es percussio de lansa o de cotel, e vezes de lu la profunditat, lahoras considera mays si de la plagua yeys ventositat quan le malaute elena; lahoras sapias que la plagua es mortal.	If there is a thrust wound from a spear or sword, and you feel the depth of it, then consider whether there is swelling when the injured person inhales; then you will know that the wound is fatal.
E si en lu no es profunditat e la plagua es recent am le sieu sanc, lahoras tu pauses en lu de la primieyra horo polvera, e no strenhas aquel per que no sia le sanc retengut en la profunditat de lu e que retorne al cor e que aucigua le malaute, mays pausa en lu enguent atractiu, e deslia aquela doas veguadas le dia.	And if there is no depth to it and the wound is recent with fresh blood, then in the first hour apply powder to it, but do not press it too hard so that the blood does not remain trapped within its depths and return to the heart, causing harm; rather, use a dressing that attracts fluids, and change this twice a day.
E si l’enguent no es a tu present, lahoras tu pausa en le orrifici de la plagua coto viel per que sucque aquo que yeys de las humiditatz; e fay que le malaute dorma sobre la plagua per que corra aquo que es en lu ajustat.	And if a dressing is not available to you, then place over the wound opening a piece of cloth so that it absorbs any moisture; and make the injured person lie on the wound so that what is trapped within flows out.
Mays si ja de la plagua son passatz tres dias o mays e no accideys al malaute spasme ni tremor de cor mal ni strictura de ale, e vezes las autras dispozicios bonas de lu, lahoras sapias que plagua es salva; e adonc cura aquela am calguas e am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanada.	But if three days or more have passed since the wound occurred and no spasms, tremors of the heart, or constriction of breath has affected the injured person, and you see other good signs from it, then you will know that the wound is safe; and then treat it with dressings and other treatments until it is healed.
Mays si la sanacio de lu es excusada, e ja tot temps es uberta, lahoras sapias que ja es fayta fistula; cura donc aquela per le sieu capitol.	But if healing of it is unnecessary and much time has passed, then you will know that a fistula has formed; treat it therefore according to its chapter.
E si la plagua es per inscisio de spaza o de cotel, e es simpla en la superficia del pietz o del dos, lahoras cura aquela am aquo que es precedit de sutura, si es gran, o am polvera, si es petita.	And if the wound is from a knife or sword cut, and it is simple on the surface of the skin or flesh, then treat it as would be done before suturing, if it is large, or with powder, if it is small.
Mays si ja ha fayta enprecio en le os, e so ja de lu inscizas pessas, lahoras tu torqua la plagua e coyta ad extrayre aquelas pessas, si so separadas.	If there has already been an attempt to clean the wound and pieces of material are still inside, now you should turn the wound and try to extract those pieces if they are separate.
Mays si no so separadas, lahoras leyssa las entro que se poyresca la plagua, que la extraccio de lor es alleujada.	但如果它们没有分离，你现在应该将它们留在原处，直到伤口愈合，因为那时取出会更容易。
E de las autras plaguas accidentz en les autres membres le juvament en curacio es le juvament de aquo que havem dit.	And for other wounds in the other limbs, the treatment during healing is as we have described.
De las plaguas del ventre.	For wounds of the abdomen.
L’indisposicio la qual accideys en le ventre es o gran, o pauc, o migiera.	The condition that occurs in the abdomen is either severe, slight, or moderate.
De la gran alcunas veguadas yeys le budel o nervi del budel, per que es fayta intromissio de lor e la sutura de lor esser pus vehement e pus subtil.	In severe cases, you may encounter the bowel or its nerves, which requires careful manipulation and delicate suturing.
E disrupcio petita es fayta dificil per autra manieyra, e siec se que la reduccio de lor es pus dificil, si no te coytes de la intromissio de lor al sieu loc tantost, quar se ubre e es engrossat per que le intrament de lu es fayt difficil.	A small disruption is difficult to handle by other methods, and it is important that reducing them becomes more difficult if you do not immediately return them to their proper place, as they tend to stiffen and swell, making manipulation difficult.
E donc la milhor disrupcio es migiera, quar en aquela no es dificil la reduccio del budel, ayssi cum es dificil en las doas specias denant ditas.	And therefore, the best condition is moderate, because in that case it is not difficult to reduce the bowel, whereas it is difficult in both of the previously mentioned cases.
E sapias que sutura del ventre es segon quatre manieyras, mays doas suturas son comunas que conveneysso en suturas de las autras plaguas del cors.	And you should know that there are four methods of suturing the abdomen, but two of these sutures are common and suitable for suturing other wounds on the body.
E duas autras suturas proprias comunican a las autras plaguas, mays empero so mays proprias en la sutura del ventre.	Of two other specific sutures communicate with other wounds, but however more in the suture of the abdomen. 
E yeu recomti a tu quascuna am exposicio e declaracio.	Here is the translation:
Donc dic que quan la plagua es petita e es eyssit alcuna causa del budel per aquela, e es fayt dificil a reduzir aquel, lahoras aquo es en una de doas manieyras: o per parvitat de la disrupcio ayssi cum havem dit, o quan al budel es venguda inflacio per la frigiditat de l’ayre.	Thus I say that when the swelling is small and some cause has occurred in the intestine for it, and it is difficult to reduce it, then there are two ways this can happen: either due to the smallness of the hernia as we have said, or when the intestine becomes inflamed due to the coldness of the air.
E donc quan aquo es ayssi, lahora cove que tu scalfes aquel enayssi que tu submerges una sponga ho drap humit en aygua tebeza sola, o que coguas en aygua squinant, e cyperum, e spic, e embroques am aquela le budel entro que la imflacio sia resolvuda.	And therefore when this is the case, then it is necessary that you warm it in such a way that you immerse a sponge or cloth in lukewarm water alone, or soak it in hot water with cypress and spica, and apply it to the intestine until the inflammation subsides.
E alcunas veguadas fa aquo vi en le qual ha stipticitat, e es milhor que la aygua sola en resolucio de la imflacio.	And sometimes it does this in cases where there is styptic quality, and it is better than water alone for resolving the inflammation.
E donc cum tu vezes la imflacio esser resolvuda, lahoras tu humecta le budel am aygua en la qual es coyta altea e malvas, quar per aquo es alleujat le intrament de lu am pauca causa.	And when you see the inflammation resolved, then you moisten the intestine with water in which hyssop and mallows have been soaked, for this soothes the instrument with little cause.
Mays si es escusat le intrament de lu aprop aquesta curacio, lahoras scindeys la disrupcio un petit am strument am le qual so inscididas emorroydas.	But if the intestine is irritated near this treatment, then divide the hernia slightly with an instrument with which hemorrhoids are incised.
E la curacio primieyra es milhor, quan es propriada que no es seccio, e no sia occupacio a seccar aprop necessitat e defaliment.	And the first treatment is better, when it is appropriate that there be no cutting, and there is no need to dry out near necessity and deficiency.
Del instrument, sec se la forma de lu:	Of the instrument, this is its form:
La una partida de lu torta aguda, e l’autra partida no-acuta, e la extremitat subtil, e no sia am la subtilitat de spatum, abantz sia obtusa un pauc.	One part of it is sharp, and the other part is blunt, and the tip is fine, but not as fine as a spatula; rather, it should be slightly rounded.
E donc cum la plagua es amplificada e yeys fora le budel, lahoras cove que la sua reduccio sia segon la forma de lu natural, en le sieu loc propri, si es possible sobre aquo, quar milhor es.	And thus when the inflammation is increased and pus has formed outside the bowel, it is now necessary that its reduction be according to the form of nature, in its proper place, if possible in this way, for better is it.
Mays quan la disrupcio es ampla, e es en la partida pu bassa del ventre, lahoras cove que tu fassas jazer le malaute sobre le sieu dos, e pausa las suas cambas pus autas que·l sieu cap; e si es en la partida pus desus del ventre, lahoras tu pause le cap de lu e·l pietz pus autz que las partidas dejos.	But when the disruption is wide and it is in the lower part of the abdomen, then you should make the patient lie on their back, and place their legs further apart than their head; and if it is in the upper part of the abdomen, then you should place their head and feet further apart than the sides.
E semblantment si la disrupcio es en una de las doas partz del ventre, lahoras pausa la tua entencio e la tua consideracio tostemps en aysso per que la partida en la qual es la plagua sia pus auta que l’autra.	And similarly, if the disruption is in one of the two sides of the abdomen, then you should focus your attention and consideration entirely on this so that the part where the inflammation is may be further apart from the other side.
E ayssi cove que tu aministres aquo en las plaguas grans e en las plaguas migieras.	And so you should administer this for both large inflammations and moderate ones.
E en las plaguas petitas, pausa aquo que es a tu preparat, e aprop fay que·l ministre sia entre las tuas mas pyatados, le qual tengua la disrupcio tota am la sua ma e ajusta las labias de lu, e aprop descuebre de aquela ad aquel que siec la sutura alcuna causa aprop autra.	And for small inflammations, prepare what is necessary, and then have the one most skilled among your assistants perform it, who should hold the disruption entirely with their hand and adjust the lips of it, and then proceed to suture it at some distance from each other.
E aquesta es la manieyra de sutura comuna: una que prenguas la agula, o comte de agula segon la cantitat de la amplitut de la plagua; e aprop layssa de la extremitat de la disrupcio del dit anular, e strenh la agula una, otre que tu no metas fiel en las doas extremitatz de la codena, am doas extremitatz del ciphac que es dejos la codena de las partidas dedintz, entro que fassas aquela penetrar de aquela partida; e tu ja has agreguadas doas extremitatz de la codena e doas extremitatz del ciphac, e so faytas quatre ordes.	And this is the common method of suturing: when you take the needle, or a piece equivalent to one in length according to the quantity of the width of the inflammation; and then lay it from the end of the ring finger, and pull the needle taut so that you do not place pins at both ends of the thread, but between both ends of the suture that is inside the wound, until you make this penetrate into that part; and when you have joined both ends of the thread and both ends of the suture, it makes four knots.
